For being one of the biggest company on earth you'd think the app would be flawless. The delivery time given when shopping changes after you purchase a product depending on your address, even though it already has your address while shopping. When you click to enlarge a product image, it's always buffering and most of the time doesn't load at all regardless of how good of service you have or are on Wi-Fi

Amazon is great if you like having your orders delivered to the wrong address on a constant basis. Their products used to be great, now it seems like most things come from Wish, so you never know what you're going to get. Prime membership is also useless because most items take almost a week to arrive even though it says second day delivery. They have really gone downhill with their products and delivery service. Buyer beware!

Well I like Amazon overall but there are just some things that annoy me: 1. Too many notification, I get app notifications, sms notifications plus email notifications for the same update? Probably I can change it somewhere in settings, but if not please fix that. 2. The deliveries come one at a time. If I buy 10 items then my door bell will ring 10 times? Cant you arrange for all the shipments to arrive at one go then deliver at once.(Noon does this and its amazing)-Add delivery instructions

The best thing about Amazon is how easy it is to do returns if you need to. Like, stupid easy if you live near a UPS store. You don't even need a box for anything that isn't a large item. 4 stars because a lot of sellers have the same item listed and use the same photo as another seller but the item you get isn't actually the same. Quality control varies. You genuinely have to read the reviews for everything to know which seller to make a purchase from. Customer service is great.

Amazon is unfortunately so easy and convenient to use for many purchases. O.K. "death of the high street", "exploitation" all issues that kinda niggle at my conscience, but then I selfishly think, "it's cheaper", "it's delivered quickly and it's effortless!" Like it or lump it, times will change. Never had any major issues, either with the app or with Amazon.

I was trying to make another account with the same phone number cause I don't use me last account. It keeps saying "failure to connect" so I went to my account (this one) and tried to verify it to disable it but whenever I clicked on the link, it never worked. I really like Amazon its just things are confusing now. It used to be so much more simpler.

A lot of good things about this app. 3 annoyances; App opens the ui frame of the legacy bloatware app and freezes so I have to close out anf force quit just to reopen. when I click a link, it will not take me to the item I cannot copy a link to share..too many diff ways to share within different apps. ...i use the 'copy link' feature the most. dont compose an email for me, i may want to quickly share with multiple group chats, emails, sms. navigating/adding item on wishlist sucks

This review is for the app itself, not Amazon service. There is consistent lag from simply loading a page to seeing the item's options. Scrolling through product recommendations goes from a minor annoyance to an unusable hassle. The list is constantly loading while you scroll, often sending you to the wrong item that you clicked. Kindle and Amazon are the only apps I have issues with on my phone, Amazon's website works fine on the same wifi using my laptop.

This update broke the app. When I tap on something I want to view, I nornally have to scroll down the page to see names of items and prices, and when I do everything except the image disappears. I try to reverse the problem by scrolling back to the top; everything flickers for a moment and takes another 10 seconds to load in. Not great, the previous version of the app was way better.

Terrible app. They expect you to pay a constant fee for Prime when you didn't even want it. 14$ was constantly being charged to my account to the point I straight up cancelled every order I had pending because not only were they harassing me to pay the 14$, they also kept telling me to revise a payment when I didn't know what to do. They kept pushing the delivery date back. I've had enough of this app and deleted my account on Amazon entirely. 0/5 stars if I could rate it that

Easy to use. Love the feature that allows you to buy right away and also send what you are viewing in another app like WhatsApp. Customer service is good as well. Also if an order doesn't show up due to an issue with the delivery carrier they automatically refund it to you and let you know as well. Also send you updates via email and you can check the app as well.

The update is AWFUL. It use to show lists of items you may be interested in, now it shows a total of FOUR at once, with no details. Four?! And you have to keep scrolling for more lists and more items. Plus the main tab was moved to the bottom which is just weird and clunky. God this update is terrible.

Love the convenince but not last update. On product pages certain options won't fully load the product photos, so you can't see all photos nor heart them. Viewing the wishlists now has problem when you scroll down a few items it bounces you back up as if you have reached the end of your list. I found scrolling back up a lil and then scrolling back down quickly makes rest of the items load. I saw a new feat. order $35 of eligible items will be delivered same day. The "time window" I got was wrong

i have shopped a lot for years with amazon and i have never been this disappointed with them. they are no longer efficient, no longer reliable & customer service is getting worse everytime there is an issue with an order. they begining to be like walmart's customer service. last issue i have w/ them is with an order that never arrived. tracking # won't even pull up. it is already several days late. checked today it shows may be lost in mail. they won't replace nor provide a refund.

Payments are annoying and inconvenient. It doesn't charge you when you order, only when it ships, so if it ships half a month later (for some reason, that's another thing, it can be super early but super late), it charges you that week it ships out and if you spend a decent amount of money, BAM, dent in the bank you didn't know was going to happen.

Latest update: Application only seems to work if you are in the United States for some reason. Not a fan of new icon. Had to make many returns because the product was refurbished and the product language used was not in english or was completely missing instructions. Please watch the prices there are multiple vendors for most products. Amazon is a great company and I wish the vendors were as good as Amazon, there are so many unverified vendors

Service is slipping. Not Amazon but the app. It was user friendly. All of a sudden every page I click I get an Error Go Back to Home. I click go back, Error. I close and open, Error. I uninstall then reinstall, Error. The app needs to be fixed. I can't halloween shop. My daughters bday is coming up. I'm just gonna order from Ebay if they can't fix this. As for issues with the company I give those a 1 star. Can't get 2 day shipping. Lost packages. Drivers not reading instructions. It's simple...

Amazon Prime is amazing. Any issues with a product 24/7 chat available. My daughter many times has gotten the remote for the fire TV ordered a show that I did not approve of and they will help you out. Example she ordered PGA Tour, I hate golf and they refunded the money for it. Free shipping as long as it has the prime ‚úîon the item fast and friendly delivery. if it dosnt arrive when promised they will help with expediting the shipping. Prime has movies for free to stream with no commercials! ü•∞

This new update really totally sucks. I have been a loyal Amazon Prime customer for over a decade. And had no complaints. That is, until now. The update to their app makes it almost impossible to contact customer support or to file a complaint for items that are taking too long to ship. The status of items purchased is completely worthless. The app no longer gives you information for when the item got shipped, who the carrier is, nor when the expected day of delivery is. Going to switch.

The latest ui changes are very disappointing and weird, as I find it hard to believe anyone thought the changes were sensible or acceptable. The ux has severely deteriorated due to layout and the need to click extra buttons to go to pages, such as orders, when previously it was a simple one click. I'd hope the developers either revert to the previous design or mak significant changes to the current design.

Terrible update. I can never find my orders, and have to click through multiple screens to find my cart. All tabs allow for searching items, but don't go to a separate search tab - instead just open new pages in that tab like a browser, so you never know what you're on. Overall TERRIBLE. I've started using the website instead.

App needs some work. I have a Motorola G7-Play phone. Pretty good phone - not the highest end, not garbage. Anyway, the Amazon app often freezes up or outright fails during searching or when I try to check my current orders. Also - the "track your order" is totally screwed up. I had an order to be delivered today, and it was. The problem is the app said the driver was 10 stops away but the order (package) was actually delivered, it was here but the app said otherwise. App needs some tweaking.

Amazon app and prime have been great up til the last week. App isn't working properly, missing items upon delivery and my store credit is gone and I know for sure I haven't used it yet, what the ef is going on with Amazon????! The issue with the app is the only tab that works properly is the home tab. My account tab, cart and the rest just lags or says that something is wrong on your end. I'm close to deleting my account, if only there was a working app to do it on... FIX THIS PLZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ

I just "updated" my good ol' 5-Star, but slightly cranky, "Amazon Shopping" app to the brand new version yesterday. The old version which I had been using for the last 18 months or so had begun to get a very hesitant and slow so I decided to update. Bad decidion. The update doesn't work. Two of the 4 links across the bottom of screen (the settings link and the one second from the left, I forget what I was) didn't work at all. Finally just uninstalled it and am now quite happy using the website.

I really don't like the new UI. It makes it impossible to find anything by wasting so much space you have to scroll forever to see anything, there's a lot of things missing, and it's really awkward too navigate now. The old design wasn't perfect, but it was far better than this mess, and at least I didn't have to constantly scroll to see more than two things at once.

Newer app is unfortunately slow and takes forever just to load menus to get to where I need to go. Whomever thought it was a good idea to change the menu system is now my mortal enemy. Edit: Lowered to one star as the new menu at the bottom is so obnoxious and makes browing with one hand near impossible without accidentally going somewhere else.

Nearly useless on Tab S6. Layout is obliterated. Navigation is horrible. Everytime I click on a link in Chrome and it opens it lands on a reduced version of the homepage. Nothing is working as expected. I guess I'll have to stick to using it on my smartphone and PC. Really impacts my nightly shopping hunt in bed. What a bummer.

I really like the app and the veriaty of items you can get but the reason I rate it a 1 star as my first time using Amazon, one of the two items I ordered were canceled and they had to give me a refund which I was fine with, then on the day the second one was supposed to come, it didn't even deliver on the day it was supposed to and the next day it tells me it's undeliverable, which I think is unfair and quite odd as it is my first time ordering with Amazon.

This app is terrible now. The rearranging of everything is such a pain. But 3 things make it garbage: 1. They hid the contact customer support behind several more screens and clicks. 2. The text box for customer service is covered by the keyboard and you can't see what you're typing. 3. Errors causing it to not go to the cart, checkout, or other sections require closing the app and restarting to fix it.

I've performed the fixes suggested by the developer, but the app is so slow and unresponsive I'm not shopping until they get it fixed. This has happened several times in the past couple of months, and I'm a Prime member who purchases dozens of times/mo! Had to search for customer service, and an item I just bought says refunds are available, but when I go to the purchase the only options given are return and replace. I even took pictures of how bad the item was.

I love shopping on Amazon. In all the years that I have used their services. I have only had to return one item and that was because the item was not what I had ordered. I followed their instructions and the item was returned and I was re-emburshed fairly quickly. On the whole their drivers are efficient and deliver to me on the day and time stated. Most of us, need things from time to time and search different websites for cheaper prices, I can say I'm a proud Amazon shopper and enjoy Prime. üôÇ

Love Amazon. Used to love shopping with this app. Beginning about a week ago, it glitches and freezes so often. About to stop shopping with it because the experience is so awful. It even is so bad it double ordered an item. Once the glitching, freezing, and crashing is fixed then this will go back to a five star review.

I have used other apps and none compared to the features that Amazon has. They have the easiest returns. Amazon has fixed each problem I had with a return, shipping, or anything else with their customer service. I can get a real person when I call customer service. Not a lot of online companies do that. Also keep ordering multiple addresses shipped out to. I doubt check the check out process, and I haven't had any problems. I love shopping online at Amazon. I have deleted the other apps.

When I go to browse under my shopping lists on the app...I like to use the Low to High price filter....well for the past 6 months everytime I use the filter the prices start off with the lowest but then after a few items the prices start mixing up!! Basically the low to high price filter does not work!!! It needs to be fixed. I'm sure it happens with the high to low as well.

It was good, then stopped working. Uninstall, restart, reinstall, no success. A shame Changing to 1 star. Clearing cache, uninstalling, restarting, reinstalling, no combination of the aforementioned works. Assigning this too the software bin. Will find somewhere else to spend my money 8 May 2021. It's no longer possible to use the app using multiple accounts because the "switch account" function has been removed. Extremely disappointing, even customer services didn't know about the change.

Haven't used app. I just wanted to say that i think it Really sucks that this app comes pre-loaded on my phone and cannot be uninstalled. I run on a very limited service and data and I have a very low grade low-cost phone provided through a government program. I have no space on my phone for apps I will not use and do not need. My phone has maybe 15 gigs of available space for me to use. There's not a lot of space to begin with and it comes pre-loaded with a lot of bloatware.

ETA: Saw a ton of recent reviews saying the app isn't working, slow prime shipping, etc.; wanted to say that I've been a customer for years, prime for a couple years, and have ordered TONS lately with 0 problems!!! I use this all the time to shop. I prefer it over the website because I'm usually on my phone while shopping. It is very easy and intuitive for tracking packages/returns/orders & order history. I also love the AmazonSmile feature, something I found through the app.

I love Amazon but the app has room for improvement. the app seems to be more efficient (less crashes / loads faster) with the newer phone. However, recently there are formatting problems. search results are much larger than my phone screen. have to pan all around outside of my viewing window to see the list. Find myself using my web browser. Also, some products are OVER ADVERTISED.... TOO MUCH! Also, wish they would get rid of the pages of results and for the love of pete ALLOW DARK MODE, pls

Amazon is no longer fast even with Prime membership. The shipping has been getting slower and slower. I now have to wait over a week for anything I am needing. That gives me a whole week to go to the store & buy it my self. It comes down to money vs. time. Yes sometimes! Amazon has a better price but you have to wait a stupid amount of time to get it. Not to mention your already paying monthly for a subscription, so unless your buying thing all the time your item just secretly went up. Canceled

DO NOT UPDATE TO VERSION 22 14.0.100!!!! Amazon ruined a good app. Now when I try to use the app after the update all I get is a screen that says "something went wrong. " Now I need to find a new shopping app. BTW, if you try to use Amazon through the web browser there are also problems. The web page is SUPER slow and CRASHES over and over. It's a SUPER HEADACHE TO ISE AMAZON NOW!

The convenience is great, prime shipping is ok. I feel like it shouldn't be so much, especially if you can afford to give discounted rates for some people. I hate that your order is charged when it ships making it impossible to keep track of your charges. I want my order charged when I purchase not split into 4 transactions when each ships. Amazon is getting too big and lacking on it's service.

The Devs need to concentrate on what matters: the customer experience, and not change for change's sake A few months back they introduced a new UI, and I've given it fair time to prove itself but, I hate it! It's made things way more of a guessing game to find functionality than ever before; not helped by there now being two menu bars!? But worst of all is that this app is now so painfully slow to use. In both cases, things are getting so bad that I've frequently resorted to using the website!

The latest update is terrible! The app has become very very slow. The whole description of the product doesn't appear on the top of the page when you click on the suggestions provided. The options/colors etc of the product disappears if you swipe left to see all of them. The menu feature takes about 25 seconds to load. Overall frustrating experience. Many times ive just gone to directly to the product website to order there instead or just close the app and mind my other business, which is good.

Love the app! Easy to use and love Prime! Only four stars and not 5 because the pricing seems to have increased on many of the products. I realize that it is similar to other sellers like eBay or Craigslist, that seems to be the problem. Originally it was surefire products you could rely on direct from the manufacturers at lower prices. Now, not so much. Wish the pricing and products were more dependable as was the past. Still, great üëçthough. Beats fighting in the stores and wearing masks üò∑.

I always find a great deal. The search always gives me results. If I don't see my item, I just scroll. There will be alternatives, bargins & things to check out. I love the ease of use, and the low or no Shipping cost. Their returns are easy, says my friend. I've always been satisfied with my orders, Oh, & no, I'm not a professional reviewer. I would not have written such a long one V L Myers 1/10/2021

My only issues are trying to cancel subscribed channels. It says to go to membership and subscriptions,manage subscriptions ,Advanced controls . The help section says the manage subscription is beside the channel, the advanced controls in that menu. Advanced controls only shows up in Prime Membership I have two channels I have been trying to cancel now since the trial ended. I was hesitant previous channels we tried to cancel we just cancelled Prime Membership to finally get rid of them.

App is clunky and horribly slow to respond, even on high-speed wifi connections. Ads for "sponsored" products take up too much space in the search results (often disguised as a curated list of "top" products) and at the top of the page on a product you're viewing. The effect is to hide better related products under a mountain of sponsored items that may be irrelevant to the user. A poorly designed, unresponsive app intended to manipulate users into purchasing select products.

Search results are infuriatingly terrible. Most of the page will invariably be completely unrelated with zero matching words. I know what I'm looking for when I do a search, and I don't need an algorithm that thinks it knows better. Just show me items that match the words I search for! It shouldn't be difficult! It would be so much better if there was a way to turn the algorithm off, but we all know that won't happen.

Not a fan of the update, i no longer get push notifications, nor delivery status. Previous version was right on top and accurate when had pictures and delivery maps. Last order was delivered for some time only when i checked my email did i see the delivery email. The layout is different rather than a nice easy list everything is buried under sub menus. Additionally relocating the menu bar at the bottom makes it harder than when it was on the left side.

The app is great, staff is very good and friendly, shipping speed is amazing. The biggest problem with Amazon is that most of the products are made in China which makes very poor quality products from my experience. I understand plastic is needed for product profitability but China even uses cheap brittle types of plastics.

The whole point of Amazon shopping is to make shopping easier and quicker however this is not the case. The search parameters are useless, you can't set a specific price range (only under 'X' but often dont work). So to get something around ¬£10 you have to set the search at lowest price first and then trawl through pages of trash. Not worth a prime subscription as i get better results through a google search, or Ebay, often with free delivery or with delivery at the same price of prime items.

I've been through the process of app down loads and synch them. After 2 weeks of trial I have yet to get the cameras to register with the cloud or initialize the camera. I am really disappointed with your product and its capabilities. Wish I had read some reviews and watched the videos of the down falls of the W6 system. If I had I surely would of gone with a bluetoothable system. But out of 2weeks of trial and error I have yet to get the cameras to work. 4 paper weights is what i got.

Latest update didn't fix the messed up at all! Move the menu bar back up and fix the phone button colors - it turned mine white on white! Over time, this app has become an incredibly slow, bloated, resource hog. And no, I don't want to search by voice or by picture, and you don't need access to my microphone or camera. This was a much better app 3 years ago! The eBay app performs 1000% better and they somewhat respect their customers privacy. I'm now considering dropping Prime...

Used to love Amazon and being a prime member but I've had so many issues and the fact that shipping times are now almost a week if not more out even with prime I've stopped using them I used to get at least 3 or more Amazon deliveries a week but the delayed shipping does not work for my small business needs I've had to use other options. It makes me sad because I've always loved Amazon and never had such issues if it wasn't paid for by my phone carrier I would cancel my subscription.

Awful! I have been an Amazon prime member for over 5 years. As of recent, I have been scammed out of money, finicky transactions, and their customer service is unreliable! I canceled my prime membership a few months ago when I noticed unauthorized transactions coming from my bank through their company. Now that Christmas is near, I took the risk to purchase some gifts through their platform and now I'm left disappointed once again.

I don't get the hype over this app. I kept hearing Amazon and amazon so my expectations were high, but damn did they go üìâüìâ as soon as I used it. First of all, it's expensive af. Second of all, when I search for things, the first results that come up are out of stock. I have to open every single item to find something still available, and trust me, it takes a long time to find it. And when I do, it's super expensive.There are much better and cheaper apps so I personally don't like it at all

Since new update the app just crashes it take me 10 times longer to find items I type in the item I want to buy then as I scroll down app crashes and I have to restart its very frustrating I also prefered the old layout opening wishlist is now a real mission and when I finially get onto to my wishlist app crashes and I have to start all over again. I find that Ive gone back to Ebay instead over the last week because of these irritating problems

When trying to quickly buy gpus online the app lags for 40 seconds on a modern fiber connection with a modern phone. not able to even click through stock updates for rtx 3000. app most of the time does not even load. then when you try to uninstall it so you can just click through to the web page. it leaves the app to auto update in my play store instead of removing it so i cannot as a human even try to buy gpus from amazon really missed the mark of a convenient shopping app

Love Amazon, but the newest update is terrible. The links are actually slower to load now. Looks cool, but they overcomplicated it enough to slow it down to a halt. At first I thought it was my internet, but it happens every time I use the app and it looks like other people are aving issues with the newest update as well. I'll update my review to a positive one once they get around to fixing this.

Amazon should not have changed the app UI layout and half the reviews no longer come up. They had better listen to their users before everyone finds out it is faster and can be cheaper to go out and buy it local. Before this last change I had been watching the prices increase and availability of fast shipping products that I want decrease. I have moved my shopping back in person and won't be coming back unless they make this usable and grow back into the company they were.

Horrible experience. Set up credit card for monthly prime payment but the debit card I use for purchases was charged instead. Caused an overdraft they would do nothing about. Then set up for a reminder to cancel before next charge and the app did not remind me. Can sure tell me what AMAZON would like me to buy from them tho! Canceling end of the month and never using this again.

Was fantastic .. but recent changes to the look and feel, as well as the functionality really took a step backwards unfortunately. I'm using the most current Android version - the menu options recently moved to displaying at the bottom of the home screen (prior the menu button was at top left for me to select or not). When I go to My Orders, now finding the Return link is nearly impossible in orders where multiple items were purchased!! TERRIBLE change, loss of functionality!!

I'll super honest! Amazon WAS the best option to buy for me ALWAYS! I was that kind of person that spent a lot of money just buying through Amazon, also stupid things as my dog food every single month, but amazon service actually just sucks! Terrible customer service. Deliveries take TOO LONG. Amazon has to work hard to recover QUALITY. Honestly I just going through my app just when I don't have option and I could say that this happen just ones a month or less. Don't like amazon anymore.

This app is practically unusable since the last update -- info on product pages (descriptions, buttons, pics, etc.) disappears and reappears at random while scrolling. I'll be buying from other online retailers since Amazon's customer service has been terrible lately and now this -- the meager savings aren't worth the aggravation anymore.

The app has been great and useful, but lately it freezes when free shipping is selected at the checkout. I have updated the app and tried again with no luck. At the moment I can only put things into my basket through the app, try the free shipping option, and then if it doesn't work log in onto the website through my computer to finish the order. This defeats the object of having what was a really convenient app!

Thieves. Don't bother paying a ton of extra money for fast shipping. They absolutely LOVE to take your money, then send your product 2 days later than what was specified in the payment screen. I paid almost $12 extra for 2 day shipping on a $35 product, when I tried to reach customer service to ask for a small refund, they pushed the issue aside and did not resolve my problem what-so-ever. Amazon, respectively, could topple over and lose all of it's entire business and I'd be throwing a party.

App is not working the same since last update. Idk if it's just me. But everytime I select an item and try to change some thing like the size or colour it doesn't save the selection once it's in my cart. The colour or size will change back to the original choice from Main amazon search page. So I'm unable to order items until this works properly

Amazon Fail! The app is exceeding slow to load, even when no other apps are slowing things down. All my other apps pop right up and function in good time, but try moving around in the Amazon app and I might die of old age before it loads the next thing. I've tried it with other wifi connections of better speed with no better result.

Was loving Amazon for 2 years or so, now not so much. The last several items I've ordered have been falsely advertised and I didn't get what I expected, or what was promised. Almost all sellers seem to be lying about the qualities of their merchandise. However, upon scouring every word and picture and question and additional statements, they do have the correct information. Unfortunately, it's after or in the middle of many contradictory and false statements. So, it's basically gamble shopping.

Cluttered & clumsy. Hoped it would replicate features of the website (as the view/edit Recommendations function - which I use a lot - has stopped working there), but app is just a massive, ever-scrolling billboard pushing stuff in which I have no interest. Took too long to find where Recommendations was hidden after install and sign-in, and when located were very limited and often irrelevant to past purchases. Uninstalled. Will persevere with .co.uk in the hope that the website will be fixed.

Stupid app keeps using the wrong card even though I selected the correct card and shipping address and clicked continue. When the order shows correct everything, radio bottons checked, it still screws up after I click continue. today's order cost an extra $20 because somehow expedited shipping was checked *after* I reviewed everything. I chose standard shipping. the truly sad part, the expedited shipping will arrive around the same time. One more screw up and it's adios! Had enough!

Love Amazon but I hate their new app interface layout. Why place the menu button at the bottom left of the screen? Just felt much better & easier to use when they just had one menu access button(the three lined button that took you to recent orders, account etc) at the top left corner if the screen. For people who generally use their phone with their left hand it sucks. A way to edit button locations would be great so these stupid needless changes don't feel forced on us.

Once again, modified to hide the most used function- order tracking now two levels down when it was only one level down before, requiring one to work to get past the ads. Also, this version is notably slower especially when retrieving order status. I guess this will accelerate my shift to buying more from walmart.

For a company valued that much you'd think they could have made & optimized a better app. It does the job don't get me wrong but as of last couple updates, the restarts, abhorrent freezing of my phone on a constant basis to the extent that I'd have to just leave the phone for a few minutes before it catches itself to name a few. For now I prefer to use the web browser on my laptop to carry out my shopping. Use this dumpster fire with caution.

It seems nearly impossible to report products that should be restricted. The only option to do so appears to be speaking to an employee, but company support lines are hardly ever helpful, fast or convenient. It would be so quick and easy to just create a "report product" button or something instead of making concerned individuals jump through hoops to get anything done. If there's an easier way to report a "product" on Amazon that should be a restricted product, I would like to hear about it.

I would consider giving better reviews but maybe it's that time of year for hardships. my package stated delivered but never actually arrived. However, the refund or item replacement process was very convenient and made my experience delightful. it was automated but concise. packages should be handled with better care. I understand things are in demand, but if it were the delivers packages being delivered, you'd want it to be taken cared of as if it were yours. But 4 stars!

MASSIVE issues with the app right now! Every time I try to view my cart, I get an error message and dog pictures. Same when I try to view my account. I have tried Uninstalling, reinstalling, clearing cache, clearing data, force stopping the app, and all combinations in between. No change. Wth??

I like the app alot actually and I'm surprised at some of the reviews I saw being so negative. It could definitely use some upgrades or add-ons like getting stuck on loading screen sometimes and also weeding out false advertisers who lie with random statistics to get you to buy their item even though the measurement of say lumens or mAh is obviously not the truth. I also has problems receiving alot of my gifts because I sent what was required and got nothing in the mail and no email back

The app /was/ great. A recent update broke it. I'm on a Galaxy S20, a high end phone. The app lags and stutters making it almost unusable. It behaves as though the phone doesn't have the power to run the program. That's wrong and 100% a programming problem. Until it is fixed the app is realistically unusable.

I have been an avid Amazon shopper and especially through this pandemic. Lately over the last month or so I have never been so unsatisfied than I am right now. The layout is driving me crazy I had to do a search for the customer service option never had to do that before, I select same day in the filters to get a phone case and cover today.. if the sameday isn't available then it won't be an option but it's there so I select it and all the delivery dates are 2-3 days away. I'm about to cancel

What ON EARTH was wrong with having the nav in the top left corner like the rest of humanity does? I can't believe this hasn't gone back to the nice, sensible, usable way it was until a few months ago. It was so great before, and it was really straightforward to get around the app. Now I just spend all my time obsessing about how annoying and just plain stupid the nav is at the bottom of the page. It's such a glaring error that it actually distracts from the rest of Amazon's cleverness.

Despite the sometimes negative press about Jeff Bezos and Amazon, from the point of view of a customer and a long time subscriber to Amazon Prime, I like this app. I can shop for nearly anything. It's efficient, the prices are reasonable, delivery is quick and I can return nearly anything for any reason as long as I do it within 30 days. For most returns, I don't even need to wrap them. Amazon sends me a QR code. I take the item and the image of the code to my friendly neighborhood UPS store.

I love the shopping part of Amazon! Let me be clear when I say that I have no complaints about the amount of stuff Amazon offers and I love my Prime membership. These are my problems. When I try and sign on I'm told that my app is not supported but that is the only Amazon app! There is no update, no new app, nothing. When a large order is delivered I have to look at my order history to figure out what everything is and at each product to see how it works. Not cool. Amazon can do better.

I have to uninstall this app constantly. Not sure why or how, but it keeps installing onto my phone. I'm not an idiot when it comes to tech, but I have never, ever purposely installed this app and yet, every other week there it is, in my app drawer. This is a fresh OS install as well, so no viruses or malicious apps to blame. However they're managing to install on my phone all the time, I'd prefer if they would cut it out. Otherwise, I love Amazon.

I love Amazon and all the people who work there, very professional and always Available. However the web links of Amazon products don't open in the application and it's really frustrating, because sometimes I fail to find the product I need to purchase from the app since I don't want to log in/out from the browser every time.

Customer support systematically lies. Shipping dates are intentionally falsified. I've had many explanations and Shipping details on my most recent order. Worst part, the item in question still has the wrong shipping date on the items description. Amazon is aware this date is wrong and is still telling people it is correct.

The newest update is confusing and cluttered! Who puts all the main menu at the bottom when your hands always covering it!? Well HAHAHA! Revert to the previous layout with your tweeks and I'll install it! Untill then, sod off!

I've uninstalled and reinstalled the app, but every time I click on the product it cuts back to the home page. So I guess I won't be ordering anything. Which is fine because the last time I ordered something from Amazon I ordered 2 of the same product. One came as scheduled, 2 day prime shipping. The other one came 2 weeks later. One time it wasn't delivered and the driver just stopped delivering at like 3pm. üòí So apparently they don't want to work either.

New UI is annoying, much preferred the old one. To boot now all of the images are boxes of text. They need to fix this ASAP, I want to see what I'm buying guys.... I've had so many delivery issues, stuff missing from packages or the packages just don't turn up.its not on and it can't continue. 11 out of 72 deliveries have gone right... those aren't good odds...

Quality products at great, competitive prices. Definitely pays to be a Prime member. Not only is delivery super fast, reliable and efficient (and free if domestic) you get the added benefits of Prime Video, exclusive deals and so much more! (and no, I don't work for Amazon... just a regular customer who enjoys shopping in the comfort of her own home lol).

New update is HORRIBLE! Blank screen trying to load item info or other pages. Reviews for items are all mixed up. Looking up handheld electric can openers. Both top reviewed are reviews for things nor related to a can opener! Misdeliveries are getting really bad. Not completely Amazon's fault but are UPS and USPS being charged back for screwing up deliveries? Then it takes 2 full days to get a refund or redelivery. I'm Prime. Prime is getting less and less attractive.

Amazon, a company that is all encompassing, dependable, very competitive with service at your fingertips. They offer not only their own brands but other reputable businesses have a chance to showcase their wares. No overselling an item and then you wait months hoping to receive. No issues with their service, always courteous, quick to replace or refund if needed. Deliveries as per order most always intact and on time, it's hard to beat Prime.

The Amazon Shopping application is a staple in my life. Amazon offers a user friendly, convenient, simple, easy to use on the go application giving you easy access to their pandora's box marketplace where you can find anything you need, at the lowest price (guaranteed). At the touch of just a few buttons I can find what I am looking for, my favorite brand, and I'm my favorite color. Amazon offers several payment options, making check out just as easy! This application is perfect for anyone busy

Having to switch countries to look at orders I've made for family members and its absolutely tanked. Can't find any of the options. Or the options for the options I need. Absolute garbage. The cart button disappears. Whenever somebody happens to send you a link in another la language it changes your entire language settings. Don't buy 1 left items if the are fulfilled by Amazon. What happens is that Amazon doesn't have the product yet when it's already selling it. I like that I can shop and get just about anything and usually order 2-3x a week. I haven't received too many things that wasn't described...meaning pretty much what I Order is what I get! The only downfall I have is that sometimes it says an item has been delivered when it hasn't or promised a product in 2 days (prime) but takes double the time. other than that, I'm satisfied and will continue to order. also, if I need help an order, customer service is pretty good too!

Amazon shipping and customer service has become absolutely terrible. I canceled my prime membership after many many years of being a prime member. I also canceled more than a dozen subscribe items. I love this app. It's much easier than the desktop version. It look different on my partner's note than my s9 but it runs perfectly fine and fast. It definitely make shopping easier. revised 20/12/21: Amazon's excellent service continues with this App which now incorporates their grocery shopping app, with slots often just a few hours later. Good customer service. Great app, but needs an improvement. A specific one. You see, in chrome, I right click on the link, and make a group tab. This way, I save time by simply clicking on all the ones that look interesting, and then switching to the new tabs to get more info. But I can do it all at once. Here, I do not have this option. Hence a 3 star. You'd greatly increase to a 5 star if you made this change.

I haven't had any issues until this morning. All of a sudden after a update the app will not open on my android. I have uninstalled a few times and reinstalled to no help. Indescribable. Such an amazing app/store/lifechanging innovation. I am so inspired, moved and touched by Amazon and my experiences with them. This app is the scourge of Facebook. Amazon keeps creating new Facebook profiles to Spam the app from. I've had amazon take extra money from my account and call it pre-authorization holds several times. I contacted my bank and they said it was amazon taking the money, not the bank holding it. Usually it was ~$20 orders, but the last straw was when they held $180 for a month for a $60 order. I had bills that I needed that money for. It took contacting amazon 3 times before they refunded me. This should not be able to happen. I will never use Amazon again. Don't use debit on amazon.

I love this app. I use it literally everyday. I'm giving it a 4 star because for the last couple of days, the app has been crashing. I have to un/reinstall just to gain access. But as soon as I close it, it starts crashing again. This started happening after the change. Please fix.

New version - rubbish user interface - change for the sake of change. Just about every function has moved to a new place, and usually requires more clicks now to get to what we need. Why ?! it gets evermore difficult to track down the best item. This is because of the promoted ads or sponsored products. No matter what you do, the promoted products get in the way of your choices. Terrible, the new update is full of bugs, one being you purchase something then when you want to go to basket next time it will take you to your last purchase, really annoying cause you need to keep pushing the back button all the time. The app is so slow to open because of the sheer quantity of ads and sponsored content that needs to load. Can usually always find what you're looking for and at a decent bargain as opposed to chain stores but be smart and look at all the information provided by the seller. Do not like the new layout at all!!! To small print and crammed all together hard to enlarge to see what the heck.it is your buying!!! Do not like at all!!! I'll go back to morning save awhile. App keeps crashing. Here's how i fixed it (Android). Go into phone settings, apps, find google chrome, uninstall updates to chrome. Then go to play store settings and turn off auto updates. Restart phone and your apps won't crash. Some people report uninstalling updates to system webview also works. Don't forget to undo all of this once they fix the bug.

Horrible experience with order cancellation. I have been a loyal customer for over 7 years with them, I never witnessed an issue with order like recently.
