When I open the app and browse using its integrated search function, the app works fine. But if I open a link to Amazon and select Chrome to open it, the Amazon app hijacks the link. This wouldn't be a problem, but it usually opens an empty window with a bar along the top that says "Amazon Shopping" and I have to force quit the app and try again in order for it to work. Amazon's simplified my life. It has allowed me to purchase items otherwise not available in my area....and allowed me to shop with as little contact with people as possible. The app is incredibly easy to use....and even when I have mistakenly ordered something....Amazon's customer service has always been above and beyond my expectations.

It took me over 10 years before this app was actually on my phone now that I have it I don't know how I lived without it the quality and the comparison of Price shopping and the Lightning Deals saved me thousands and I spent almost $20,000 the first year. The app doesn't work properly it freezes constantly restarts by itself at random times and it lost my items in the cart I was about to purchase a few times. bank had changed and I hadn't had the chance to fix it on amazon till today, I get charged $13.54 for prime, which it's only supposed to be $12.99 for a regular account, but my account had been a student account so it should have only been $6.48. I've tried any and everything others have tried w/o success. I use a Samsung Galaxy Note 8; nothing helps.

I love amazon. The only thing I don't like so much about it is that sometimes it's hard to find what you are searching for because it has several items listed that are not even close to what you are searching for. But the prices are pretty good and I love the convenience of shopping online and getting it delivered and amazon is great for fast delivery! I also love being a prime member with all of it's benefits, especially the movies!

This app is poorly localized, at least for Singapore. Size charts are missing, reviews from other countries are absent, and even searching is faulty (results are far too non-specific/ broad) for Singapore compared to when the settings are changed to e.g. USA. Further, when an item is found in the US search and a suggestion to buy it on Amazon.sg is displayed, clicking on this often directs one to a blank screen. This indicates poor mapping of stock across locales.

The Amazon mobile App is no longer Amazing. I can understand shipping delays. Amazon prides itself on the online purchasing experience. The app has had a number of issues, The Oops Dog (Unable to find item) is one. Reviews for items showing a completely different item. The unending clocking at checkout which includes clocking when choosing another payment method, or free shipping that does not involve Amazon Prime, which is shoved down your throat at every opportunity. Ebay should thank Amazon!

Don't do Amazon Day to combine shipping. It's not worth it to the customer or to the environment. Every time I have done so, they leave one ordered item out. It's like the employees are conditioned to put one thing in a ridiculously sized box and ship it ASAP or something. They aren't given the time to, or are actively not encouraged to count to five and it all comes in 4 boxes anyway...just with extra waiting. It needs to be easier to report incomplete orders. Not broken. Not damaged. Missing.

done with Amazon. not the first time they would deliver with a delay of more than a month. after losing patience, asking for a refund and looking for alternatives in the local market, a notification would come, with no indication of the specific order. except if you only order once per year, you might want to open the package and check which item that is, before returning. but then you will be charged, usually more than the value of product to ship back. 1, 2, 3 times... that's enough.

Love Amazon I use the app all the time. The only problem I actually have is I pay $129.00 for Amazon Prime. Which means I get discounts and free shipping. But I have to pay for movies, and tv apps that I was getting free by registering through my cable provider. Now I pay for each individual app. That's not fair. The $129.00 should take care of membership and programs.

Not so much about the app itself but the content. When you select one item, it suggests two other items to go which are unrelated at best and at worst ridiculous. Also, it is unfathomable how the algorithm comes up with completely nonsensical suggestions. Is this the much touted AI in action?

Slow as hell sometimes. I don't know what it is, but searching for certain items causes the whole app to freeze. Please fix the app, it's been terrible lately. I'm on a Pixel 5 phone, so it's fairly new and certainly can't be the hardware. 8GB of RAM should be more then sufficient for an app.

Why can't you just put the menu in the upper left corner like every other app on the planet. And then have the categories listed then broken into subcategories. That way a person can zoom to read and navigate. Your app is ridiculous. The sorting is horrific. It's easier to use the desktop site on a 3 inch screen phone.

App is ok, it could do with being able to zoom in on pages, i have Prime, the TV and movies are not that good, most are old shows and movies, some i would say are classed as B movies (Netflix is better) I don't order a lot from Amazon, only if i need something quick and it's part of prime, so next day delivery, most things are available on eBay a lot cheaper with free delivery.

Loved this app...HATE this new update. Ruined it. I use amazon regularly. Get books every day through amazon unlimited, We also have amazon prime, watch movies and buy regularly from here. HOWEVER....new update is slow, complicated, full of stuff that are of no interest to me, unintuitive and lastly....just stopped working! Home page can't be displayed. That meant for 3 days over the easter weekend I couldn' use it. Your loss. But this update us simply awful and unnecessary. Worked fine before.

This new update is frustrating! When looking at any clothing it doesn't show me the rating unless I click on the specific product. Other items not apparel related still show the ratings though. It takes me twice as long to show and is now making me not want to use the app for clothing purchases at all. It needs to be changed back! "If it's not broke don't fix it!"

I can never open this app without problems, it used to be just fine. It takes hours sometimes days to place an order because the "oops something went wrong" screen constantly pops up then I have to reload the page and start over again. Called customer service and they said they can NOT help with the tech problems. Super frustrating

Unable to install the application. I was using Amazon India. Changed my playstore country to UK when I moved here. Uninstalled Indian version of Amazon and tried installing the UK version many times but it always fails. This issue is not just for me I know a lot of people who is facing this issue, all moved to UK from India. Its the same with FireTV stick as well. I can't use my original email ID. It shows all Indian FireTV option. They should have county specific options for people like me.

When I search for something specific, I don't get what I'm looking for. Fabric material should be one of the options (cotton, wool). Things like high rise low rise for trousers. Electronics too, ALL search options should be better and more detailed. " " and - searches should be possible. Review search options should also be better.

Great selection of products! Extremely helpful to have ratings right next to the product on the very first picture of the item AND see how many people wrote reviews it helps to decide to purchase or not. Prices really rival the big box stores and I go back to first statement, they have that NO store can compete with. Plus no schlepping stuff around a store and to your car...delivered right to your front door! Also, and finally, SUPER easy returns!!!!!

Been a customer 25 years, but finally no more. The amount of times ive clicked on something that said it was $20 only to be $60+ on the actual page is uncountable and gross. Litterally every single thing ive ever ordered thats been advertised "1 day" which is why i ordered it has taken 4 days plus. You tell me its within a few blocks of my house every time to tease me and then delay it more and more. Ill just pay more to shop ebay. Thanks

Has never worked right on any of my pixel phones. Links and images seem to hang and sometimes never finish loading. The app crashes constantly. The browser version works way better than the app. Not worth installing. This app is definitely a miss for Amazon, at least on Android.

Amazon is garbage. Use to love it. Ever since they started this verification bs I refuse to buy anything on amazon. Everytime I logon it seems it's saying i have to verify my profile again. Literally I've done this 50 times. Then they want you to send a picture of a statement of card you use on file. Doing it once or twice to verify I understand but. If I login 5 times during the day, I gotta verify it every single time. Whoever was in charge of this new system they use. Should be fired. Awful!

For me there is one design choice that I really hate. I'm dyslexic which means I rely heavily on voice to text programs. This app won't let me use the voice to text program that comes default on my phone. It forces me to use the Alexa one. When I try to do a search for a product I want to buy it will sometimes try to do other things. For me this is incredibly annoying. I have to go to somewhere else in my phone and copy then paste it into this app just to search for something to buy.

Idk what happened but everytime I try to search something, the view is jumbo sized and I can hardly see anything. Its not worth the hassle trying to order stuff now if I can barely see it. Once its fixed, I'll rate 5 starts because before that started happening, it was perfect. *Edit - Issue resolved

Poor customer experience. Searches show sponsored items regardless of search string, sponsored items breaks the sorting feature, for example sorting items in order of price doesn't work at all. Returns are easy but contacting a seller has been made impossible so there is no way to get questions answered, you either love what you get or send it back, nothing in between is allowed via this app. Not made for the customer, not made for the sellers, made only for the sponsors. Would rather give 0/5

Easy to use, with no major bugs (at least not any that have affected me so far), and very versatile (you have shopping / wishlists, different languages, shipping options and payment methods). Shipping is tracked directly in the App, with live view, and the overall prices, shipping speed and customer support have been excellent so far.

Amazon, youve been a great app, 5 stars really, but for the love of christ PLEASE fix the app. Your latest update ruined you and clearly by these reviews a lot of people agree. I can hardly search anything but on the now rare occasion when I can it either never loads, or most commonly, Ill click on one thing and then the app freezes so I cant save it, buy it, or compare it with a similar item.

Ugg, this app is such a pain! Especially when dealing with wishlists. You can click on edit on an item and it will either freeze, take forever to bring up the ability to edit, or simply refresh over and over without ever bringing up the edit option. More often than not it's simpler and quicker to just go to the actual website and do everything there.

Doesn't work on Google Pixel 6 Pro, the keyboard overlaps the chatbox when talking to Amazon's useless customer support. Switching apps resets it, so switching to read an email whilst chatting to the useless customer services means I've got to start all over again. I can't edit reviews, I just get some useless red error message. It's just wasting my time, may as well use the website.

Check all system and in app permissions and settings. There is no way to remove/permanently disable the Alexa button. If I accidentally tap and enable it I will immediately disable my account and permanently uninstall the app. You have around 15-19 square inches of screen space and you already use FAR too much of it on a search bar and nav bar that can't be hidden. Its just annoying.

This used to be my happy place but it seems that the company where I got almost everything is not holding up their end of the bargain and the two day shipping I have always had not longer is a benefit and i am getting ripped off. Take your business elsewhere. Shipping is faster at Ebay and they don't charge an extra $120 year for a membership you are not receiving. Even Wal mart has better pricing for two day shipping. Amazon has lied to all of us

I am satisfied and have been using amazon for years. Mostly credible good service. A downfall is interface with local delivery services. For. ex. I orderded a book and could see it was processed and shipped, but could not track it after that. I got a notification that it is on the way to delivery point, and will be notified when it arrives. From a refund notification I found out it made it to the collecting point but I never got any notification its there to be collected.

Ordered an ethernet cord, it was delayed twice. Once without any notification. On the day it was supposed to arrive I had to approve the item prior to its arrival on a desktop computer which is difficult from work. The email they sent to verify the account is mine does not open or allow the downloading of the image. Currently dissatisfied.

App keeps updating with useless UI changes. Why change the my lists and my orders to be at the bottom in a sub menu? Not sure if these changes are considerate of the all types of devices. Also changing the orders and lists to another location will cause people from ordering when they are trying to be quick. Sometimes you just want to find an order or something off your list and taking longer to do it makes the difference in buying or not buying..

Pages load at a glacial pace, if at all!! Moving icons around for filters etc, is one thing. However, how can we shop if the items enter in to search for don't even get listed. Or when they do, won't open, all photos to swipe through don't appear when swiping. Order page does the same thing!!! Come on Bezos IT team, get it together! He's losing money from this last update, as are small business owners!! Went back after this review, page still hasn't loaded, even AFTER I cleared my cache!!!

Prime Day is a joke. Ordered an item at a great discount and same day delivery. Order went through. Item was on the way, then it was marked as late, then it was marked as undeliverable (and out of stock according to customer sercice) and I'm being refunded and unable to buy that item at sale price. What's the point of Prime Day if we're unable to take advantage of it and actually get sale items? I'm quickly becoming disillusioned with Amazon, it's a shame it's so convenient.

For me personally, easy to use app and have been using and buying things off of it for years. Two stars because the app doesn't work a lot of the time. It fails to load, and just shows a white screen or loads weird and I know it's the app cause wifi works and so does 4g. Edit- Had to drop it one star as problems still persist

Lately when I place an order I have no option as to shipping time. Since the phone updates, even if I choose the soonest shipping option it defaults to the Saturday a week away. I tried to delete my amazon app, but it will not actually delete. I was wanting to delete whatever was causing the shipping to take so long. Please change that on the app. The rapid shipping is why I use amazon in the first place! Thank you.

I love the app but unfortunately every time I make a selection the color or size seems to go back to the default setting when I add it to my cart. This has resulted in multiple orders being the wrong color or wrong size. So disappointing. Hope they fix this because I'm not buying clothes from Amazon until they do.

It had worked great until a few days ago. Now nothing...this is so bizarre how are all of Amazon's apps suddenly not working? I just noticed today that both audible and prime video are also having issues. I can't use my credits on audible and the video player won't play back anything so what's the point? Btw have already tried downloading the updates and restarting my device and no issues using other apps. Get it together Amazon!

I've tried adding hub locations to ship to and it won't let me. I can't even just look them up. Living in an apartment with a hub station I'd much prefer making use of it instead of getting door deliveries. A neighbor said she couldn't even find the apartment hub listed. Amazon is getting worse. I have a cart full of stuff waiting for checkout. Until everything is fixed I refuse to shop Amazon.

Latest update not working, click on the product everything above the picture disappears. To see the pictures on reviews is a struggle. I wish I could go back to the previous version. And despite de glitches, I never liked the search filters, you search by a certain brand and the results are totally not the brand I want to see.

App is super buggy!! I never never used to have this problem, but since the most recent update the app will completely freeze up and go blank on me, whenever I try to go back.... And also other random times. App just freezes up a lot I have to exit out and close completely sucks because I lose my place completely.

I pay a whole lot of money for my packages to NEVER arrive on time. The lies on this app! I buy mp3s and have to contact customer service to listen to MY music because they are pushing paid streaming. The only good thing about Amazon is their movie/TV content. Also the fake reviews on products should be better policed.

Horrible ..Not sure what they did but with all the money and resource that Amazon has, how can you make an application with so many glitches?? VERY slow and freezes up when you try to look an item.. Funny, that they can build a spaceship but can not make a decent app!! Fix this!!!

Normally I'm very happy with this app but lately it has been frustrating me so much. It's not allowing me to save or delete items from my cart which is preventing me from ordering anything. I need a few of these items for Christmas but others can wait. If i can't remove items I'll have to order from target or wal-mart again. Very disappointing.

My orders are always delivered quickly and with prime membership shipping is always free! once I had any issue with a product where the item was damaged when I recieved it but amazon quickly fixed it by sending a replacement. Customer service was fast to fix my concern. Professional service! I love Amazon they are my go to when i need something.

Very disappointed. Sent me an offer to download the app and you would give me $20 off my first purchase of $40 or more. Downloaded the app. Started my shopping and went to checkout. Coupon showed. I remember I wanted to add something else. Upon adding the new item I returned to the cart. Coupon was gone and could not get it to work. Deleted the app and will return to using the browser. You should not offer rewards you don't honor.

I ordered from Amazon last week and I'd be happy to see a shopping cart notification on my phone for delivery updates. When I went to the app on Monday to show a coworker the item I received that was in the car, the app self updated to the box. I was very disappointed. Now the notification is a weird line that I don't even recognize (the smile), and it is for product advertising. My app never did that before. My Amazon settings auto-change when the app updated, since when?

I'd give it less if I could. It does not show all the results, very limited and frankly, I don't much appreciate having products hidden from me. Went through all the options, filters and settings. It's not me, seems everyone has this issue when checking online. What's the point? Just using the website on my phones browser instead, way better. YCSTAUYA

When I open an item if their are other options when I click on the other options the image doesn't come through clear... it is in the gray mode like it's thinking, I do not get a clear picture. Rachel dunning said it best, I 100% agree. It might be time to shop individual stores

I haven't been able to place an order for about a month. I have enough items in my cart for free shipping but obviously Amazon is going to automatically select the delivery option with a fee attached. I try to click on the free delivery option and my screen freezes every time. Needless to say, I'm not going to pay for shipping if I don't have to. When I try to contact customer service, I recieve no help at all. At one point I loved shopping on Amazon but this is just ridiculous.

Good, convenient. Easy to use, and obviously faster than using a desktop PC. The near realtime delivery updates are reliable. Occasionally doesn't work, but I think that's an issue with Amazon servers, not necessarily the actual app. And no app can be perfect!

I love shopping on Amazon. I often use it to compare prices if another sites shipping time is not acceptable for a similar product. If my local stores are out of stock for a product I need, I know I can find it on Amazon. I have had all of my issues with deliveries and returns solved effectively and efficiently by their customer service.

I was using this app earlier today and it worked fine. I'm currently shopping for telescopes and as of an hour ago none of the individual item pages will work. I click on a particular telescope and rather than it taking me to that items page with description, reviews, ect-it just kicks me back to the home page. Everytime. I tried selecting an item from a specific search term I'd entered-back to home page. I tried selecting an item that Amazon had put on my homepage-back to home again. PLEASE FIX

This app is terrible, just stick to the main site. This app added random things to my basket on occasion and because I though I had been hacked I changed my passwords. On doing so it meant I lost all my playlists on my amazon music, and also had to re-sign in to all my amazon devices and fire sticks. All because this app made me think I had been hacked when actually it was the app moving things in my basket that had been 'saved for later' for months ago, back into the basket. Naff!

Makes life so much easier. Minimizes time spent on errands. Search and purchase from wherever you are. Much better than a store. Stores are individually rated and products vary. See it all. Don't worry about not finding your size in one location see all. One stop shopping for so many goods and products. Don't need multiple stop errands. More free time. Easy returns quick deliveries. Life made easier!

Every experience has turned out to be positive. Even when something had gone wrong customer service fixed the problem immediately! I love shopping on Amazon! Definitely one of my favorite shopping apps, if not the best!! Thank you Amazon workers for everything you guys do especially during this pandemic. Now we know nothing will ever slow you guys down!

Easy to Use app. Sometimes it's a bit slow, especially when it comes to scrolling a list or creating a list. Every now and then scrolling through images of the item is also slow. I like how every purchase goes towards a charity of my choosing! Thanks

I am seriously fed up with Amazon. My account was locked for no reason which they claimed was "suspicious content" which I was only ordering a shirt and a coat. My account has been suspended for 2 weeks. And not to mention my money was NEVER reimbursed into my debit, credit, or gift cards. Money wasted on this pathetic app. I've never dealt with anything like this from Amazon until a few weeks ago. This is absolutely unacceptable and the worst customer service with no understanding or help!!!!

No way to exclude terms in your search, and amazon doesn't monitor misleading and/or straight up dishonest listings, leading to a lot of wasted time and potentially wasted money. The (-) operator to exclude terms in a search has been around for a long time... you'd think the richest company in the world would have the cents to implement it!

Dude I can't buy anything literally. Its saying my card doesn't match up with the numbers and when I try the scan option instead, it just stays stuck on a black screen. Its not my phone cause I had to download a scanner app to test it and works fine. So idk if this is an Amazon thing or whatever but as a first timer to the app, its absolute hotdog water and piss.

Amazon already knows its the best. Do I really need to post it? Almost anything I want can be found on Amazon. The prices are super competitive and, sometimes, incomparable. The delivery is super, super fast! And their service is so outstanding, only the rich get better, maybe. So they're you go. Amazon is the best!

App spontaneously sends a pop-up to my phone's email and it cannot be stopped. The pop-up in LARGE, intrusive and I get one for every single package, every single time I check email on my phone. Hours spent with Amazon techs and it cannot be stopped. Ridiculous; won't be ordering from Amazon nearly as much anymore.

Amazon is not what it used to be. I have been a Prime member for years and for the first time ever I am thinking about canceling my membership. I NEVER have 1 or 2 day shipping for anything I purchase and this has gone on for months. I know other people who have it. Everything now takes 5-7 days. I do not live in the middle of nowhere. The new layout of app is also frustrating. It has become quite complicated. Also good luck trying to reach customer service. So disappointed.

Just use the website! The app has become completely unusable. I'm met with error screens at every turn. Constantly having to reload the app or the page to try to eek out the slightest bit of function from it. Wouldn't even have the app if it wasn't factory installed and impossible to delete.

honestly the app keeps changing in bad ways. search functions are basically useless. every time a parameter is changed it goes back to results instead of staying and letting us further refine the search. as it is now I have to open the filter menu like 6 times whenever I search for something. fail.

It was perfectly fine until the last update. Idk what Amazon did but please fix it. I don't like the fact I have to scroll back and forth just to see items, even then it continues to zoom in until one item takes up just about my whole screen. *UPDATE: The issue has been fixed so I bumped it back to 5 stars.

HATE this new app interface!!! Whoever thought this was a good decision should be fired. The new app is not user friendly like the old one, and is complete garbage. It is counter intuitive to fast easy shopping, and did I mention UGLY as sin? For whoever designed and approved this change, fire them and put this nonsense back to a user friendly interface that doesn't have the menu where the phone controls are (ever heard of "ain't broke don't fix it" ? Wasn't broke, didn't need "fixing").

Update is rubbish. When buying books cannot add kindle books to basket, so if you click buy accidentally you will be charged, which means you can't add discount code. Amazon suggest you add it in accounts then look for books, if this is correct why isn't this method used for other products. Can't also see what I'm typing when chatting with customer service

Amazon its a massive company with many loose ends. I say this because of what I have witnessed when working for this company, as well as ordering from it. They're very disorganized, packages are always delayed, even packages that I've canceled before shipment arrives anyway. Making the returning process a hassle and a half. This company is nothing but a nightmare. To other it might be great, but I've had enough of the disappointing outcomes. I will no longer shop on Amazon's website.

The app auto-corrects your search terms when you press the "go" button, so there is no way to find the product. For example, I tried to find Nordace (brand name luggage) and it changed it to Nordic and presented me with diet supplements. This app is completely useless since you can't find anything,, and it is getting uninstalled from my Galaxy S20 Ultra after I post this review.

The new update has ruined the amazon app. Super slow, sometimes won't load things, and pictures will only load for every other item I click on. Getting really frustrated. Also I hate the new UI. I hate the hoops you have to jump through to get to something like your orders or lists that used to be so simple.

The Amazon Shopping app is clunky and does not have all the functionality of the website. Recent updates have not been improvements, and moving functions from menu-based to icon-based and button-based selections makes the app less user-friendly and less intuitive to use. I prefer the website more and more every time Amazon updates the app.

Okay I don't know what it is but the last update freaking sucks, I swear something is wrong. When I first load the app it's relatively okay, but when I try to look at something I'm thinking about purchasing, it just won't let me look at the photos like it wasn't done uploading everything that was supposed to be on the screen in the first place. I also want to know if you can tell your orders that you have received it instead of saying 'still shipping' when I've received the order months ago!

I really do love shopping the Amazon app. Bad thing is, ever since Jeff Bezos decided to do other things & leave Amazon for someone else to take the wheel, I've had 2 shipments lost. The first one came very late, and the one I'm having problems with now, most all of the 10 items are non-refundable. Then when you want to talk to a real person, it's hard to get connected. Thinking about dumping my prime account.

Amazon prices have gone up a LOT this past year. Most things used to be cheaper on Amazon... check pricing before you buy!!! There are many other options now days as stores have set up pickup and delivery. Amazon's customer service is also not always great, I am sure it depends on who you get, but some of my experience has not been favorable.

The new update for 2021 is awful. Unbelievable slow bringing up menu and retrieving order status menu. Buttons relocated at the bottom constantly being pressed unintentionally when using phone with one hand. Not sure why they would change the layout, but it was definitely NOT an improvement.

Amazon has uploaded over 13gb of data yesterday, while I have done nothing beyond browse and order 1 or 2 things. I reached out to Amazon showing the logs but have not heard back. This sounds like a major security and privacy issue as well as burning through all my mobile data and racking up big $$$. Happy to provide more details.

I love the Prime app. However, it has a language glitch. . The app and the website automatically changes my language preferences to Spanish when I open a shared link (cart items) from someone who uses the settings in Spanish and it takes a number of times to reset the language back to English permanently. Please fix it. I have use this app for many years an couldn't be happier. It offers every option to make easier your shopping experience.

Amazon is what it is, too big to fail and too big to give any kind of customer service. It's also hard to beat on price and shipping in most cases, just hope you don't have a problem. This rating is just for the app which tends to be acceptable but nothing special but the search is infuriating. Its search autocorrects as a default and won't let you enter what you want. Enter a part number that it thinks should be autocorrected and you cannot make it search for the correct part number.

App works except for the pictures of the item. If I click the pic to look closer and see other angles in the rest of the pics, I have to sit through the spinning circle forever. No matter how long I wait, it never loads. This has resulted in me looking for a lot of items elsewhere to see if it's what I'm looking for then I end up buying from the other site I find the item on. As a result, Amazon accounts for less than ¬Ω of my online purchases. When it worked Amazon got nearly all my business.

I "was" obsessed with this app....until the most recent update...now I actually hate shopping with Amazon....it's not too bad if you don't need to chose a different colour or size but if you need to pick an available colour or size you cannot get it...it defaults to the original picture...would shop a heck of alot more if this were fixed...

I hate hate hate the update!!! You cant find a damn thing or search for your individual orders. And whats the use of prime anymore? You have to spend $35 to get one thing shipped after picking and packing, so the item can take a month if they choose. I find myself using other apps that fulfill promises of delivery, have free shipping and you don't have to spend $50 on things you didn't really need at the time. Ive used Amazon since 2014 and (used) to use it almost daily.

Not a fan of the new layout. I hate the buttons on the bottom. It makes no sense. Photos stopped loading since update, constant errors loading. It's driving me insane, I've had to shop elsewhere. App has been not working correctly for weeks. I can't load photos or items I want to buy. It's all messed up.

Extremely hard to navigate and difficult to use. Tried searching something and nothing related came up and whenever I tried to click on one thing, it takes me down a completely different lane and doesn't take me to where I want to go. It'll also start glitching and lagging randomly and I have to close the app for it to have a chance at working again.

Updated app is unfriendly layout and slow and feels more like I'm on a webpages with slow refresh than an app. Awkward now for fingers to navigate most used pages. Use to take seconds to pop on and check orders. As a developer my advice is, if it ain't broke don't fix it. This update is a step backwards.

Great app! Convenient, the pictures and descriptions are clear. It is trustworthy and fast so it's the 1st place I shop. Just want to report that there is a glitch when trying to upload a photo or video in the reviews section. The banner shakes and I cannot tap the boxes that allow access to my photos so that I can Upload one for my review.

Amazon used to be great but it's definitely lost it's touch. I started an account so my husband buys me a $500 Amazon gift card to add to the account balance & it goes through just fine so I place orders then I get an email saying my account is on hold for unusual activities. I follow the instructions for unlocking my account by sending a picture of the receipts for the gift card & it still hasn't been resolved. Even if the orders ever get sent, it'll be the last time I purchase from Amazon.

Crashes ALL THE TIME. Even when I've uninstalled and reinstalled it. It will crash 3 times just trying to buy one item. Crashes when I search. Crashes when I add to cart. Crashes when I try to check out. Crashes when I scan barcodes. Crashes when I just open it. My phone isn't even old.

Make more item availability. Too many times I have seen a book or item available on other platforms but not on Amazon. In all categories from books to household to sports gear. In other words I wish you all sold Ivory tusks but that's not happening so please provide alternatives closet to the real thing. The website and app are excellent and consumer friendly. Item selection or availability is sub par.

Searching and filtering have gotten much less convenient over time. Harder to find what I need. Edit November 2020: getting still worse. There are no filters available at all on some clothing searches. Edit September 2021: dropped another star because it completely ignores my filters choices. I no longer have any control over search results.

This app is very broken at the moment. If there are multiple options for a product, for example, colour or size, and you select one, you may add it to cart but it adds the colour or size of of.the original item from the list and not the changes you've made. If you're not paying attention, your order will not be what you selected at all.

I use this app quite a lot and have mostly positive experiences, so I wouldn't feel right giving it less than 3 stars. HOWEVER can someone explain to me why it takes SO LONG for the pictures to load (if they ever do) to look at a product close up? It can be infuriating to want to read the text on a box front more clearly, but the dang pics never want to load. I am in grey loading ring hell 90% of the time

My only complaint is billing. For example, let's say I buy $100 worth of stuff from Amazon. It makes sense that I would see ONE charge for $100 to my bank account, right? Instead, I'll see something like this: a FIRST charge for $69.83, a SECOND charge for $17.47, and a THIRD charge for $12.70; they won't all be charged on the same day, and usually, a few days later, there's an "adjustment", a credit for some small amount. Amazon, ONE CHARGE, PLEASE!

It's extremely difficult to find high quality items because there are so many cheap, poor quality items rated close to 5 stars. It's not surprising, as it seems like 1 out of maybe 5 things I buy comes with a "receive a $5 gift card for giving us a 5 star rating" card. I've stopped using Amazon for anything other than brands I know and have been happy with in the past. I'm also finding that I'm shopping more and more from other sites (e.g., directly from manufacturers'website).

Please list if an item will be sent via hopeless aus post so no one buys it. Hopeless search and filter options. Intentional poor design to promote some items over others. 10 sec. search takes days to get what you want. Then when found it's usually 9/10 times cheaper locally or from someone like ebay. I'm really trying to love Amazon, but those issues stop me. & Aus post take WEEKS then don't deliver just card & run meaning I have to go out anyway and could just buy locally. üò≠

It's so buggy. I change the shipping options and it loads for forever. All the animations slow down the app, and if you see a product on the home page, good luck finding it if you click on it; its just a misleading thumbnail for a category. Advertisements *inbetween* listings of items I'm trying to peruse to buy. Really? Im already buying on your app. Why advertise to me? Oh and also, why do some of the side scrollers not allow me to continue scrolling downward?

Your app has gone a bit wrong since your last update. You might want to look into that. Lol. (it's really slow, loading things I didn't request, etc). Otherwise, never had a problem. Did prefer the basket at the top, though. :) Please fix these issues for the next update, otherwise I'll have to use the browser version instead.

Unfortunately, Amazon allows so many bad companies to sell on there site that you never know the quality of what you'll receive in the mail. I have "Prime" which is a joke because not all "prime" items are returnable without shipping charges. If it arrives on my doorstep broken or in used condition when I bought new, I shouldn't have to pay to send it back! Sadly, Amazon just isn't what it used to be :''(

Very slow to load and move from option to option . Would prefer to downgrade to previous faster earlier app version. I don't know what is wrong with Amazon these days, they seem to be getting most things wrong rather than right. I'm becoming very disillusioned with Amazon.

Make sure you deactivate your previous device if you get a new one because if you isn't you will never be able to log in with your account. And don't bother trying to get support from them because they have nothing but canned responses about orders and password resets even when you clearly state what the issue is.

Terrible search engine! The whole shopping experience is massively marred by can only be explained as a 'lucky dip' search experience. Even if you search for the exact title of an item it will bring up something wildly unrelated and then after a good 5 minutes of looking I give up and go to ebay 2 minutes later I've already bought the things I need. I can't believe a company that is so forward looking has such a fundamentally terrible user experience! I only keep trying as I'm a subscriber!

Amazon, both the company and its app, just gets worse and worse. The interface is cumbersome and becomes less and less user friendly. Cumbersome to use, improper loading etc. I have noticed a marked decline in its products, vendors, shipping, service etc over the past year.

Use to be great but since the update released a few weeks ago I've noticed you can no longer access certain areas for example were it shows items relevent to things you've searched there's no way to open the list of relevent items as the show more icon no longer exists there's also times were images and feedback doesn't load up and the text is all over the place making it impossible to make any sense of what the description says this has been a issue for weeks now

Complete time wasters takes a month and a half to ship something the make and sell there self. Keep telling me stuff is being delivered then changing the dates. Once I've finally received my orders will be uninstalling never download the trash app again. Update paid for goods that apparently got lost now there saying there keeping my money for two months. Last 3 things I've ordered have been lost along with the discount I'd used.

it's OK but I've been silenced on being able to review. They think I'm getting paid but I am not and the items I purchase are for my personal use. I think they are upset that I contacted the actual seller with issues I was having with their product. All Amazon did was send a new item that was defective.

It's good but for some reason everytime I open the app its very slow, crashes, and nothing works. Recently, the app will also randomly open. I'd be doing something and then everything will stop and the app will open. Dont know why, but it is very annoying. If this is fixable that'll be fantastic!

Slow, laggy, buggy. This is the only app on my phone that is so unresponsive and slow. A lot of videos won't even play. If you click on a customer photo it's blurry but if you scroll to any other photo it looks fine. The organization of info on pages is a mess but that's the same on the website. Also no dark mode sucks at night.

The app was decent enough for what it was before the latest update which has dropped it into garbage tier status for usability. There's multiple times it refuses to load properly but the most egregious issue is that you can no longer filter your orders to only display open orders which is very frustrating if like me you make a lot more pre orders

I really like the items we've purchased through Amazon!! Delivery is usually within a couple of days and we get notified by email and text that our package has arrived with a photo of where it's been placed and how . Then we're asked to give the deliverer feedback about the delivery driver and the product & package! Returns are super simple as well and it's nice that every item also includes reviews so I know exactly what to expect..

They changed the layout to be really inconvenient. At least now I dont impulse shop because seeing the screen fills me with rage. It used to be perfect and now I cant even see a whole picture when I scroll. I literally cannot zoom out anymore and the whole screen is one picture. Also it vibrates when i try to add things to my cart or buy things and now i dont use amazon except for holidays

Amazon has been and still is a game changer for millions of consumers worldwide. They have unbeatable prices paired with unprecedented quality. Not to mention their app is user friendly & easily navigated also available for download, (for free I might add), to most people that have access to a cell phone or tablet. Amazon can provide multiple services and have made my shopping easier than ever before. Now that Amazon is here I could no't imagine having to do without it!

What happened to the app, the latest version seems like it's gone backwards. The menu text is huge and jarring against the text while browsing results, the menu buttons have unnecessarily been moved - not sure where these needs came from but they've made this app really hard to use

Great shopping, 1 star is solely for sign in problems and abysmal customer support. I've used the app without a problem on all my devices. Now, after a phone upgrade, I'm unable to sign into my account. The app returns a message about my sign in attempt and redirects to a web link for confirmation. Clicking on the link produces the following message: "We're sorry. The Web address you entered is not a functioning page on our site". Uninstalling-rebooting-reinstalling didn't work. Clearing cache didn't work. I contacted the support several days ago, no response. I'm writing this as a last resort, hoping they actually read these reviews and somebody will respond. I don't think there's much chance of that, but still.

I wish they would stop changing the layout every month! The latest update is not user friendly. Too many clicks to view my orders, weird hidden locations for all features now. Prime shipping is not 2 days from order date, it's two days from shipping date, which could be a week out! We are all being scammed. Also can't return to kohls now, but my husband can?! Customer service is a total joke. Hate Amazon.

A well designed app that enables you to find what you want quickly and then order it. Some things related to account and settings changes can only be done from a webpage rather than in the app, however that provides a bit more security and peace of mind which outweighs any minor inconvenience.

my experience with shopping with Amazon has been good so far. I get what I paid for and learned to do research before buying the first thing you see. Unfortunately I am bias when it come to only shopping since Amazon is the only one I've ever used and trust. Overall when it comes to service and getting what you paid for securely delivered in my personal opinion no one does it better than Amazon.

This feels like a web app, but they do an ok job of hiding it. I hate how they've simply copied iOS navigation and put all the main menu items at the bottom. Bring back and navigation drawer! Other than the complaints above, the app is fairly easy to use and I have sometimes used it to actually order things as opposed to just checking order status.

I usually don't have any problems at all with the app. I've been a Prime member for a long time now so the app makes a lot of sense for me. its great. I can do pretty much anything I can do on the website on the app! it never really crashes either. occasionally there will be a small glitch but generally its fixed by the next day (always long before it becomes a real issue). i definitely recommend the app to anyone who uses Amazon and definitely definitely to anyone who has Prime!

I really dislike the payment options. Most other online shopping sites allow you to pay via PayPal, not Amazon. They want you to keep your credit card details stored in your account, not really safe in today's world. I know nothing is 100% safe, but at least with PayPal you have that extra layer of security with payment details. The amount of junk is phenomenal when searching for particular items.

When checking orders, I need to see order number right away under listed orders instead of having to dive through three or four screens to find it. I also need to copy the number of the order instead of opening a link. When chatting with customer support I lose them because I cannot copy the stupid number when checking a status. Number is too long to remember. FIX IT

I have been trying to make purchases(declined) using my CIBC credit card on Amazon after changing location to India. I approached the bank and they let me know that they have not received even a request for transaction let alone declining it. Amazon says that some cards are not allowed to purchase. But I have been using the same card for the past 2-3 years. They could just let know that CIBC visa cards are no longer supported. But they stick to giving wrong information rather than conveying fact

Very good and I use it a lot. The only annoying thing about it is that I seem to find a good offer on something browsing on a pc when I'm not at home but then when I use the app to look for the same offer to buy it,it usually takes a lot if searching to find it. It doesn't always show the best price first. That said it's very convenient and I'll continue to use it.

Been an Amazon customer for years with no issues but suddenly the app cannot be updated and is no longer available on playstore. I'm able to use the app. As it was installed prior to whatever was changed but afraid to try to reinstall as that would remove the app. From my s5e leaving me unable to reinstall as it is no longer available on playstore using this device.

It's okay, they have some variation of everything, unfortunately the shipping times for me on a lot of orders isn't as promised. I'm getting closer and closer to canceling Prime. I could save money by paying the regular shipping fee and waiting a couple days at this point since prime delivery is getting close to a regular delivery time frame. The sad part is, I live in a city with two Amazon warehouses and I live near an Amazon data center.

I cant stand this new layout of the app. Its done well to break my shopping habit. I uses to be able to scroll through search results, now there are only a few before I have to redundantly move onto one page to the next. On top of it, half the results aren't related.

I don't have issues with the service Amazon orders, but the app has become a confusing mess. Sometimes the app is just a blank screen, the tabs along the bottom don't seem to offer a fixed function, and the addition of Amazon fresh as an overly is just weird. The website is better.

Customer service link doesn't work, keeps logging me out and not accepting my password. Doing it via browser too. The whole service is broken. And I can't get a refund on the things they haven't delivered but have marked as if they have unless I return the item or get a voucher to my account. Why would I want to pay for another thing that might not turn up though?!

A great way to save time and money, and avoid big crowds specially during this pandemic, however going to the store to touch and seeing the merchandise before buying can never be replaced. It's a feeling of its own, since it gives you that certainly of buying what you actually want while comparing right there and then with other competitors. This is my opinion of course, so just shop away!

The new layout is not intuitive at all. Very frustrating to use when you're in a rush and text size is oddly chosen for option menus. This has not made the user experience any better when no other app is structured this way. Please roll it back.

I have shopped from Amazon for years. It's easy to find things, or perhaps I should say it was easy to find things. There was an update about a month ago which has butchered the app. Pics of products are rare and when its without pics it is virtually impossible to find what I want. Descriptions merge and overlap, there are no details. It's a nightmare I used to give a 5 star review but I cant a the moment

I have updated and restarted my phone.... every time I click on something to look at in the app it takes me right back to the amazon home screen. I cant click on anything, I cant look more in depth at a product and I can't order anything because it takes me directly back to the home screen if I click on ANYTHING..... screw this I'll just use the walmart app. At least that one doesn't screw up!!

When I stop getting HARASSED with joining Amazon Prime every time I open the app, then again every time I make a purchase (not to mention having it plastered evertwhere) I'll raise the rating. Prime would he a complete waste of money for me and I have ZERO interest in it. And shoving it down my throat constantly isn't going to change my mind, just make me hate it that much more. At this point even if it would be useful I'd not want it just out of spite.

One of the worst e-commerce platforms that sucks! I recently had to purchase an insurance product from Amazon. I had to chat with the customer service three times to get a refund. Amazon talks about automation in reality they are prehistoric. They're chat system is real old. It does not have the facility to populate a URL or to upload an image

One thing amazon has that is good is the delivery. It shows when your order is near by. So when something goes wrong with your order you might not get a solution. I experienced situation where their was no solution. $$ LOST.

I always find value and quality. They were very honest and i was happy when I forgot to cancel but never used prime for 8 months and quick return of unintended payments. Only hickup is it takes a while to take funds from my acct and the orders are grouped together. I found out its better to just put money into the amazon payment system.

The order history use to be in order by date with all undelivered orders (regardless of date) being at the top. Now it's just in order by date and the delivered are mixed with undelivered. Makes it very confusing when you've opted to wait for delivery and now that order is far down the page and not at the top like it use to be. Please go back to the old orders page setup. I really hate this new update.

According to Amazon I'm no longer able to leave reviews on products. Their marketplace is riddled with con artists and sellers who pose as UK shops but are actually abroad, like China. I have no problems buying from abroad, but when the quality is sub standard and the location of the items is hidden or masked, that's where I have issues! Shame on Amazon! Greedy, money centered business practices! I only wish they cared more for the customers who got them where they are in the first place!

-THEY TRYED TO ROB ME- It was great, I used it for like 3 years and no problems at all, but no long ago in my bank account was a purchase for 400$ and I didn't buy anything, I check every purchase and it wasn't even a think, they just take 400 dollars bc, I talked with the employee if they can cancel the purchase and he told me the only way was if cancel my whole credit card, so I did it and I have my refund, but now I can't go to Amazon it just doesn't let me. Says error every time.

New update is awful. It takes ages to launch, you just get a blank white screen for upwards of 20 seconds. When it finally does launch the new user interface is pretty rubbish. Hate the buttons being down the bottom and it looks like a child developed it or it's designed for a child to use. Not impressed.

Pretty good, use it a lot as most people do. The app menu design can be a little odd sometimes. For example if you're trying to get information about a delivery, it can take you in circles through menus rather than just giving you a customer support link. Other than that no complaints.

Really hating the new update, put it back to the way it was, so much easier to use and find things, I really hate when they change stuff just to change stuff, instead of easier they just mess it up. Many times this people play with my money and time. "Default payment method" should not be turned on by default. It is a huge inconvenience that a random card on my profile was charged whenn the first payment method didn't process. The worst part is, it won't let me change it and I'll have to cancel my order and re-place it. Will be deleting my cards because this isn't the first time Amazon used them unpermitted. Disingenuous.

Amazon's control over customer choice is unacceptable. I have been using the app to buy products from Amazon for many years but my dissatisfaction grows with every purchase and use of the Amazon app. What used to be easy and convenient has become complicated and "forced". New app design is actually really good, minus you can't navigate to customer support without searching help or googling Amazon support in app and getting redirected to the app from the Google search. Seems like they did this on purpose which is super lame. also automated chat assistant is super bad. Suggests things and if it's wrong gives you no way to change the answer they suggest. Just seems like they want it all automated but it's done so in a worse experience

Not loading correctly since the change. I've never had issues with this app until they changed the logo. I'm not sure what's happening, but...I have installed/uninstalled several times with no improvement...I wish there were someone to "talk" to, so that this can be addressed.

great shopping site. quick and easy to find what you are looking for. new feature I've noticed is buying used items on what you're searching for. But be careful to read the description as there is a reason its cheaper. example a drone may be missing a battery charger so you would need to purchase separately. Otherwise great site!!

This app is so garbage now. I can't even use the live chat with customer service anymore without uninstalling and reinstalling the app, just so I can see what I'm typing because the interface won't adjust for my keyboard on my phone. They have also as a whole been a terrible company for the past 2 months! I've had nothing but trouble with deliveries from them in that time and no matter how much I report and complain, they do nothing to fix things and prefer to remain broken as hell.

The app was good until they started randomly banning my accounts but now the account I just made was working perfectly fine until I tried to buy 2 things. Amazon is my favorite place to shop, but in the decade or so I've used this app it has always been the buggiest thing on my phone, and this latest update has pushed it to a new level of near uselessness ‚Äî works for a while, then flashes white, then just white and must be restarted. Oh, and I agree with most others ‚Äî the new icon sucks, and so does the new layout (menu at the bottom).

Horrible, I am trying to link my rewards credit card, and it will not let me register. When I enter my ingo it gets stuck at select your billing address. I enter and refresh back to enter billing address. I request customer support, get bounced around, waste 45 mins if my time, and ended up leaving a 1 star review and ditching my purchase. Fix the issue and I'll finalize the purchase and return a 5 star review. Thank you.

Awful app. It's now harder to find quality products as you keep getting ads and paid content rather than the best product available. The app is slowly becoming unusable and you can't even see what's in your basket before you buy now. The app and website need a serious overhaul but I doubt they'll ever change it in any meaningful way.

New update is TERRIBLE!! Can't manage my wedding registry which is something I really do need to do because all the sudden 10 things are now out of stock all at the same time. I was going to change those items out with different ones but I can't get to them without Amazon loading something else. Once I try to go back to the registry, it won't show me ANY of the items off it forcing me to close out the app and the same thing happens on repeat to no avail. PLEASE FIX!

Updated review: Latest update makes app unusable. The screen glitches and shakes when viewing an item, also will not load the product information at top of page after you click. Have to scroll to an exact pixel position and you can see it flash then go away again. Edit: found out the issue. The app is trying to load a "Prime" add at the top but the app cant figure out how to space or place it. So top of page stays blank untill it can resolve positioning

Since I can't give lower then one star, then one star it is. Tried placing an order the other day and it was impossible. Every time I pressed the free shipping the whole thing freezes. Got in touch with customer service which was useless. The problem wasn't fixed and I couldn't place my order. Amazon CHARGED me $14.99 for that customer service THAT WAS COMPLETELY USELESS! The Issue wasn't resolved. Totally useless app, uninstalling.

Fixed the crashing issue from my review in 2019, but now the app has updated the homepage and its horrible, it's like simple view on a cellphone its makes the text large, please go back to the other view. I will delete it and it will go back the homepage that I prefer and then it will go to the updated one that makes the text large.

I'm an Amazon Prime member so I get Free Shipping on majority of items (I've never paid shipping on anything I've ever ordered). I love Amazon Shopping, there is always a good description of the item with photos. on some items they even do a comparison in quality, price, rating and specific details of the item. And majority of all orders I receive in 2 days. I have yet to be displeased with any item or the process of ordering and receiving.

I've been noticing lately that Amazon has been behaving dodgy. The most recent (and the event that prompted this review) is a simple order that Amazon claimed was undeliverable (I've order LOTS with Amazon over the years but a package of hashbrowns and LED light bulbs are all of a sudden undeliverable. So the order gets cancelled, fine, reorder. Now the price has jumped up. Sketchy as hell.

The app is probably one of the best shopping apps that you can find but of course that comes from years of experience and being the number one online shopping choice for the entire world. I almost want to take away one star because the new app icon is terrible

Some Good, Some Bad. I hate, having to have an account to browse the websites. I don't like accounts, never have, never will. But as for shopping.... Amazon has everything under the sun. And, the prices..... for the most part are pretty good. But I like being able to kick the tires (so to speak) so prefer to spend my money in the brick, and mortar establishments. Sorry Amazon, but am impressed with the concept.

Amazon app works great. I enjoy shopping on the Amazon app. I have found alot of hard to find items on Amazon. If add on prime items it ships for free and with in two business days. I have used it to find parts for my car I rebuilt my A/C with parts cheaper than parts house. During 2020 Amazon became our life line for things. We needed Shoes, clothing. Prices are usually cheaper on prime but if a few dollars more. Free shipping is worth it. I don't need to drive.

This app iss such a strain on the phone. No matter which phone I use it always lags and takes forever to load. I'm not using cheap phones, so its definitely not the phones I use. I force stop/clear cache many times a day and still issues. It is absolutely aggravating. This is 2021my generation has no patience for incompetence nor having to wait more than 2 seconds for something to load. Amazon making too much money for this issue to exist. Developers need to make a lighter version.

Used to be great, now almost unusable. Every single search now only works for a very short time. Then the app becomes unresponsive, won't open new pictures or links, won't scroll down the page. Have to hard restart the app after looking at just a few items now. So frustrating and worthless.

The new UI is chaotic and messy, and since today the app won't even open up anymore - I launch it and it freezes up until Android asks me if I want to force stop it. System restarts won't help, clearing the cache doesn't do anything either. (Using a Razer Phone 2) Poor performance Amazon - don't "fix" what isn't broken.

It's a good app, easy for shopping and finding things you like. The only thing is I wish the mobile app had as many features as the desktop app. For example, on desktop, you can put the exact maximum and minimum prices on the filter you want, while on mobile you can only put under $25. Overall, a pretty alright app.

A cheap apps uses very cheap tricks to full customer to use Amazon Pay Apps. Never use this apps to make payment, you will never know which kind of trp you are falling into. I don't recommend this application to be used for any kind of payment, unless you don't have any other options.

I use this pretty frequently to search for things even if I don't necessarily buy the item I'm looking for. I don't hate the new menu layout but I don't think I really like it either. Honestly things that get used the most should be available when you first open the app. Not in more menus. I would like to offer a suggestion as well. When it tells you items in your cart have changed and you open that list to see the changes, why aren't the items linked so you can just pull it right up?

I have been looks for 3 days on how to add a friend on this damn app and nothing I'm not trying to manage my house hold I'm not trying to share one list I'm trying to let my friends see my public list. Everytime I send a link it just sends them to their list so they can share one. Nothing is showing how to do this. I have one friend from when I made my account but I cannot replicate this its like they have removed this as an option all together soo annoying and ridiculous.

I can no longer search or buy things because as soon as the search finishes loading it shows the error page with dogs on it, I see the same when I view an item as well. It started happening about 2 weeks ago and the app is now useless; I can't even view the item pages for ones I've previously ordered.

Usually a good app. But it glitches out on me every so often, I haven't been able to use it for 2 days now due to distorted images everytime I load the app up. I have uninstalled and reinstalled and logged in and out, I can't view anything even previous orders. The most biggest issue I get is when I go to checkout if I go into delivery options and come back out it also glitches and won't let me press continue payment and I have to keep reinstating my order over and over again until it works

I absolutely love shopping through Amazon! There are a couple of things recently that I would like to see different: They started using USPS to ship packages with a lot. I would like to see them go back to shipping with Amazon. Also, go back to seeing the GPS of the drivers.

Became complete rubbish. Can't do ant see anything! No access to my account, even through their website. On website no my activity during last 3 months, though preordered items and their emails continue to come. Even one star is too much! They do nothing to change the situation and do what they want with my account! SIMPLY TERRRRIBLE ATTITUDE TO CUSTOMER!

Changes I would make: custom content - I have NO interest in women's clothing or toys and don't want to see those, dark(er) theme - too BRIGHT! It gives me a headache, in-store codes - A) allow choice of payment to differ based on venue B) a previously set up SNAP/Link/EBT cards aren't available and it would be great to make it a default for whole foods & Amazon Fresh C) payment with a card MUST NOT be the default! Allow for prime savings with alternative payment methods.

Very bad service for the last 18 months during the pandemic, they haven't improve their customer service and delivery service. I can't remember an order this past year without a problem with delivery, either delays, wrong items recieved or undelivered items. Also, I leave them a note everytime (I beg them seriously) to keep the items on the building's front door not in the parcel room because some items get lost, but no one to hear as if I am talking to myself. They never care for complaints

The app is deceiving, it appears to function well and even gives the illusion that you are having the same experience you would have on the website. However if you pull up the website and compare you begin to notice some differences and realize that the website is far better. For one thing the website actually let's you know what the delays are if there are any, the app feels more like it's stuck in limbo the moment something goes wrong with your order. I'd say more but I have run out of space.

Amazon has gotten too big, too everything. It is no longer user friendly for me. If I repeat buy an item they want another review. I just gave one the last purchase! They push the request for me to upgrade to Prime everytime I shop. Too much info is kept about my shopping etc but it benefits me in no way when I have a problem. I feel pressured. I went back to another site. I pick, I click, then pay and done. It may take an extra day but it is a smooth process. No incessant reviews!

Like the new tabs at the bottom of the screen, easier for one hand on large phones. Great recommendations based on purchase and browsing history, very easy to use still.... But this version is extremely laggy, buggy and a lot of slowdown. Slow to respond, slow to load and glitches.

Mention the Amazon search function among friends and expect eyerolls. It's 2021, folks are experienced with effective searching. Heck, I was trained to search for my career. While the Amazon Music app is awful, the shopping app is excellent. Works well, no complaints. Update: Amazon Shopping app is now just as bad as the music one. Stuff doesn't load properly, menus don't appear, whatever they've done to 'update' it has been a catastrophic failure.

Why is the app not working?!? The suggested items on the home page, the "more itmes to explore", the "new and interesting finds", any item you search for...nothing works! Lags, freezes, refuses to load. Completely terrible experience. I have to restart the app about every ten minutes each time I use it. Iove this app and how easy it is to use. It's a great app all the way around. Thanks Amazon!

Awful update. I'm sick to death of ordering on 'same day' delivery and being prepared to pay Amazon's already overinflated prices in return for speed - only to find the app was wrong and after they have your money you find out it's not even 'next day' delivery. Latest update makes app practically unusable. It freezes, won't scroll, lags like my OLD AOL mail account. It's ridiculous. I *HATE* the new update. I shop on Amazon A LOT. With the update, the home icon is in the lower left... right where my palm often overlaps my phone as I'm browsing/scrolling. Ugh, the worst update ever. This damn thing auto updated and now all it does is crash and fail to connect with wifi. Why do this? I don't know what's happened, but this app has reverted to payment details from TEN YEARS AGO!! None of my current card details available at all. As with others, I've had problems with it hanging or unexpectedly shutting down. I have removed it as I don't feel confident in its security anymore.

I also am currently impressed with the Amazon Wardrobe service being provided just now, making cloth shopping almost as convenient as it used to be before lockdown.

The new app is terrible. The icons at the bottom of the screen was not a great idea. I get that Amazon wants more visual real estate up top, but this made navigation more confusing on mobile phones. The new update layout is terrible. Why move navigation to the bottom? Very few other apps do this. The previous layout was fine (and worked well) for many years - why change it? The new logo is not good. Maybe it's the colour of the masses of cardboard that Amazon wastes every day for a reason but I don't like it!

Terrible! If you like to use the desktop version of the site through chrome etc and you have this installed, it tries to use this useless app all the time. Wide variety of whatever you're looking for. Better know your prices before ordering. Not always the cheapest. Have only had good success with Amazon warranties. Shipping is usually fast and reliable. Final word, definitely a viable shopping option. Site is easy to navigate.

I gave 4 stars, because sometimes the things purchased are not as good a quality as expected. If you have the patience with the search filters then you can find what you are looking for. Use to love Amazon shopping, but since the update it seem everytime I click on the app to open it, it kicks me right back off. I could honestly spend hours here just "screen shopping." I suppose it's relaxing and exciting at the same time, especially when you stumble across something really neat! Very frustrating when it displays items that cannot be delivered to my location. Not recommended at all if you are looking for quick priority delivery. They don't care at all and after a week they will ask you to go for refund rather than delivering the product. The Amazon app was always great, until a month or so ago. It now takes forever to load, and at times errors. The navigation buttons also need to be able to have the colors changed. This new layout is awful, you minimalized the menu options to 4 icons and moved it to the bottom, but kept all of the follow up options for wishlists and the like at the top of the screen. I used to love amazon. I've been with them since 24 now I'm 31. I hate them now! The Amazon App is awesome. I would have given five stars except for the fact that Amazon has an issue with being able to deliver items. I may still receive my package by tomorrow night by 10pm. That's lying in my book. If it wasn't delivered for some reason then say it wasn't.

The app is super convenient, but it crashes a lot. I also wish that I'd a payment method needs to be revised, that they allow you to use a gift card as an option. Search results are plummeting so far into the depths I can no longer use them. I go to Bing or Google to find what I am looking for. This greatly diminishes your value. The new update is HORRIBLE!!! I hate using it... WHY?!? PEOPLE LIKE IMPROVEMENTS, NOT DRASTIC CHANGES!!! The index is blown up like for blind people and it's both difficult and confusing to read. It's become really difficult to find quality items .You can't trust if items are genuine and they have blurred the lines as much as possible between who's actually selling what. Works really well, however latest update has poor layout on many pages.
