Has become a Data Hog : used 800 MB of cell data just searching for products, not watching any product videos or movies! How is this possible? What is it doing to use that much data? It started doing this about a month ago. I have used this app for a few years without this happening. Last month, I saw it spike my data use so turned off background data for the app. Today, it spiked my data use while I was looking for products. So I had to uninstall it. Anybody else have this problem?

Great shopping experience, wonderful customer service and use to be fast delivery before Covid-19. Its a shame to pay for membership for 2 day delivery and now its rare to get your items in 2 days anymore. This app won't even open or install since the last update!! Please fix it!!!! I noticed it was glitchy the past week or so but the update made it worse now i can't readily track my orders!

No worth it anymore. 2 day shipping is still a week late. Customer service is absolutely horrible. We had a blanket get delivered to the wrong address. Walmart is much better, cheaper and faster. It's funny. Amazon breaks their own contracts and it's ok. If we do it, they have a fit. So long Amazon.

You would think a company a large as Amazon would be able to construct an app that doesn't regularly glitch out. I receive their "uh oh" error more than I can count. It regularly times out, fails to load images, etc. Frequently buttons are unclickable. When it does work, it's OKAY, but very unappealing aesthetically and poorly organized.

Worst app ever! All the updates ruin my app it's less and less usable. Guess I'll go back to the browser, that honestly always works best. I agree too that Amazon is going down hill. The deliveries never arrive on time especially when the item is time sensitive. Customer service is a joke. Maybe we don't need Amazon as consumers.

Update: please fix the app! It's been broken for months! I'd love to use it but always errors out to a dog picture. I'd give it 0 stars at this point. Uninstalled again. :( Frequently the app says "Oops..." and doesn't work. Would be great to be able to use it for shopping and not just receiving delivery notifications. My email does just fine with that.

The latest redesign is pretty bad for my own user experience. It is far less responsive (it now lags when I try to load my orders, never did that before) and less intuitive (placement of the menu button in the bottom right runs counter to what most apps have) than the previous setup.

Always got the ordered items on time, everything I ordered has been just like shown on the pictures! I really like the option on some products which I can by on monthly payments! The prices on Amazon are a bit higher (some of them even double more than in a physical shop prices).

I wish I knew about Amazon allot sooner then I did because of all the great services they offer. I used wish all the time until now Amazon is my go to for shopping online. The app is easy to navigate, Amazon Prime offers 2 day quick shipping, unbeatable competitive prices, and its convenience! Their customer service is great in responding quickly and making their customers experience their top priority. One of my favorite features is the opportunity to subscribe to household items you need.

I like the convenience of ordering what I want & not having to drive over an hour to do my shopping & then hoping the stores have what I need. Plus on Amazon you can always find stuff you don't necessarily need, but looks like it would be interesting to have üòÇ But if I have an issue or complaint with something they always seem to make it right. Keep up the good work Amazon!

Solid app easy to use. Get it set up with your shipping info and payment information etc and it's a breeze. You can ship to other people makes Christmas buying and shipping to remote places easy easy easy. Really like it because I can order stuff for my parents and have it delivered on a subscription to them so I don't have to worry about that. Really great. Love it thank you Amazon

Used to be awesome. Recent update changed it. It constantly flashes and stops working. I have uninstalled three times. My husband is having the same issue. I have spent so much with Amazon Prime. I really hope this is fixed soon so we can get back to the five star experience.

It is very hit and miss with Amazon anymore. They are becoming the new wish with more low quality items at higher prices. The search feature is horrible too. If you put in women jackets for example, it still gives you mens and childrens. a lot of false advertising as well so the items clearly aren't monitored.

I am being forced to download this app to be able to sign in to my Amazon account. I don't want the app. I am not happy about this. I don't want this app installed, but I can't sign into my account on my phone without approving sign in through the app. STOP IT! An approval e-mail or text would work fine. Requiring the app to sign in is SO ANNOYING. I've started buying anything I can from other sites because I'm tired of this and the way they handle ads inline which FILTERS DON'T APPLY TO!

Prime is worth every penny (& saves me a fortune). I can always find exactly what I need at the best possible price. The barcode scanner is very useful when shopping in person to verify what is the fairest price to pay. I literally could not live without Amazon. The app is very user friendly and convenient. if I could give 6 stars i would

Update is so bad! It crashes and freezes constantly! I'm apart of deals groups and now I cant get the deals cause it sells out by the time it brings me into the app. It's always freezing when I'm trying to buy something too. It's really frustrating! Please fix this!

great app to use easy and well though out. prime delivery is a must and Amazon's customer service is second to non. unfortunately Amazons search engine needs bringing up to date though and pales in comparison to eBay's often similarly named items are returned in search results and allot of the sort by category's don't order the lists correctly like price low to high. overall it's just sloppy.

Customer service was horrible in assisting me correct a simple issue on my account. Not only was it extreamly frustrating having to explain the issue to not one but three different customer service representives to continue to have the same issue ive been trying to fix now for days. I will no longer be using amazon nor refering any friends or family to use the app. Customer service should be hassel free and customer oriented at all times and it was everything but.

The billing with Amazon really sucks ass. I am always over drafting my accounts because they charge me the full amount of my cart, then refund another day, then recharge me as items are shipped. This is confusing, and really just unnecessary. Amazon, really, just charged my account the first time then you pay the vendors. I guarantee you'll have more business if you did this. People are moving away from Amazon because your billing sucks.

Product descriptions are so badly translated they make no sense whatsoever. I cannot use the app in English while shopping in the Italian marketplace... (WHY??) So, I end up shopping on a foreign marketplace (to find decent product descriptions) and ship them to Italy anyway... Thankfully I can read French, Spanish, and German. However, English would be nice, regardless of my location. That's NOT nice, dear Amazon. It really sucks. -4 stars for the headaches.

Works ok. I had a delivery person only use the Shopping app to notify me of delivery. The app has no sound notifications, but thankfully my neighbour let me know I got the package. Please enable audio notifications. I'm running an Android 11 phone, and still no audio notifications. Only five-star rating I have given an app. All pieces of a purchase from research to delivery are easy and reliable. It was fine before. However, in the last few weeks, the app has been glacial. It freezes when you try to look at the next picture of an item. It freezes when you try to load another item. It freezes when you do a search. No longer shopping thru the app until they fix it.

Fast shipping is a thing of the past. Has my subscription cancelled for a while. Gave it another shot and my first order is delayed. In fact, every order says "sorry we're running late." Difficult to use. Took me ages to find out how to sort orders from low to high price. It can be a useful app, however it is frustrating when trying to totally understand your order # and your shipping/tracking number. Also, the only way you now which item it is, is from the PRICE? Way faster just using a browser, and no mistakes. This is the worst app and company you could purchase from. I would trust wish to do a better job of literally anything beforeI use Amazon again. This app is more annoying than it is useful. I prefer the website any day. Loved my old menu setup. New update placed the menu on the bottom, much preferred it on the top left. This new setup is garbage! Seems like a silly thing to complain about but the "flow" of an app can really make or break the experience.

What the hell!....I clicked a french link by mistake, trying to change back to English is a nightmare! Awful since new update. Thought the glitches and freezing was just me. Amazon has always been my preferred way of shopping online. I have been a prime member for over a decade and I could not be happier with their service. The handful of times I hsve needed to return an item have been very smooth and I will continue to buy all my online products with amazon. I highly recommend becoming a prime member.

Not thrilled by the delivery. Finding and purchasing stuff is easy enough. The issue arises from Amazon's delivery. Just dealt with a few items that said they were in transit. (Due to be delivered 2 days ago) Only to find out when I questioned them. That they were lost in transit. You're better off using individual sites and their delivery methods. Amazon does not follow up, you have to do the leg work. 2 stars.

Love this app for all that it has to offer with regard to variety and selection. I order from this app often for myself and for others. This is my favorite app to shop from, I always find what I'm looking for plus some and for really great prices. I get even better deals because I'm a prime member.

As of today it crashes instantly. Shows a white screen and crashes everytime I try to open it. If i reinstall it, it works the one time I log in to my account but once I exit the app it stops working. Tried repeatedly. App is up to date.

Decent app. Could be made easier to find things in categories. You search for a specific item and, you get that item in results plus, many others that have nothing to do with original search. Overall good app. Easy to use.

This is an app review, not an Amazon review. The app is strictly for buying and has little other utility now. The search engine is useless unless you're looking for a specific item to buy. It's virtually impossible to find a storefront page or a smile charity. And, the Nosey Alexa button brings no value and can't be disabled. And, WARNING: Alexa has access to record without your knowledge unless you block the app's microphone access directly from your phone settings ... even then, who knows.

Update: I see you just updated the app and things have not changed. It was working great two days ago. Now when I try to search for something. It won't load the item and no pictures come up. What comes up looks like the program information before a webpage gets published.

For a massive corporation, the software surrounding returns is absolutely pathetic. On 2 completely different phones, i ask amazon to send me an email so i can print the label.. so it sends an email that takes me right back to the app, just for it to take me right back to the email... another option is it takes me to a different browser where it makes me sign in, just to take me back to the app and start the process over again.. are you trying to make it hard to print the labels or what???

Absolutely LOVE Amazon app. I ALWAYS price compare things I need / want with Amazon. I find it's also a million times better than Ebay !! Reputability of reviews and products. Even good products from real brands somehow send shittier stuff through Amazon somehow!

No Add to Cart button The new design of the app and website has removed the add to cart button from the deals page. This makes everything a 3 step process rather than one step. It's absolutely pointless and a waste of time. Everything needs to be redesigned because it's awful!!!

Recent updates have caused the app to crash occasionally but also doesn't allow me to swipe up through my wishlists. They move as if they are going to swipe up but quickly snap back. This happens maybe 50%of the time I visit my lists. Extremely annoying.

I placed an order on Sept 5th, they took my money, never shipped the items, then returned the money to my card as a credit (it's on my statement) and told me my card was declined (which was a lie) and that I needed to cancel and reorder. What in L did you do to this app?. Completely broke a perfectly good interface so things are now harder to find. WHY? WHY? WHY? change it back. This sux. Search? Good luck. I tripled an item and went to checkout (20 secs) and there were no "windows" available. If you are a chronic gambler, try this Whole Foods shopping experience; you might enjoy it.

Awful new interface. How did this get released as an improvement over the previous version? There's a uniform material design language on Android for a reason. Swipe from the left for the menu? Gone. Menu button in upper left? No, now it's lower right. The UI is now super unintuitive because it's so jarringly different. This (May 2021) update is really bad.

I pay for the prime subscription mainly for the shipping speed. Lately, Amazon has been missing the mark for shipping. My packages are coming later and later per order. Ever since the app has been updated, the portion of the screen that has the search bar keeps disappearing on my phone. The screen flickers, too. I have to keep closing the app to get the search bar back. This is very inconvenient while shopping.

Horrible. Why pay for prime shipping when once you order they move it back a day and then once it ships they move it back another day. Not sure what happened to the app, but whenever I try to open a product photo or a photo submitted by a customer, it doesn't open at all. I'm on full fibre connection so that's not the issue. Amazon sells junk from China. I've received mostly counterfeit junk and had to return it. Their reviews are fake. They bait & switch reviews. While the website is better for shopping and comparisons, it's nice to have the app in your pocket for price checks and alternatives in stores, getting updates, taking photos for reviews, adding items directly to your shopping list, and so on. The app is well designed with lots of functionalty.

I really like this app. It's really been a life saver throughout this pandemic. I've ordered so, so, so many things lately and it's been awesome. For comparison, I've used another app to order groceries and whatnot and it constantly breaks and I have to go to the website and that's not very convenient at all. This is a 5/5 app no matter what device you have.

Do not create an account with your phone number or at least add an email so they can verify you. 2 weeks ago, I tried to purchase a phone from Amazon... Never had issues before this. I've called 8+ times now and each time told an account specialist will email or call me back within 24 hrs. This hold also applied to ALL prime services. I can not access the books I've paid for via audible.

Warning everyone - Flashing Lights! My app has been glitching every time I use it, when I click on an item and go to its information page, the top and bottom of the site will not show information but flash white. .. This app has always been wonderful, ran smoothly, made me love it. Having used the new layout for a little while I think it's just worse and inconsistent with other apps. It was fine, now it's just less user friendy, plus bizarrely the 'Open Orders' filter has gone. Please can we have an option to restore the old layout and have the filter restored...

I have a credit card through Amazon prime and I can't veiw a statement or see my bill without it taking me to the chase bank website. Nothing but problems with Amazon now. They say NEXT DAY or 2 DAYS but then they change that to 3 or 4 days. Used to be good for shopping but it seems like the last month has been far far worse than other shopping apps. If Prime wasnt free for me I wouldnt use it anymore.

I shop and check Amazon before most of my purchases. I usually check upcoming lightning deals first thing in the morning. With black Friday and cyber Monday coming up, Prime Members are going to be pissed off when they miss deals because they can't find upcoming lightning deals and put it on their watch lists.

I give this only 2 stars, not totally because the app itself, but for Amazon, they rarely have good deals, that is if you compare prices on Amazon to ebay, I shop ebay and get things I want way cheeper, also this app needs to be improved, it's slow and freezes alot, user interface and navigation is poor, Amazon plz improve your self and your company, I love you Amazon but for the love of pet, plz expand your buying choices for us, and plz fix and improve your app,

Love this app. Easy to use, great search function. Lately however, every time I open it, it switches languages. Super frustrating! Would give 5 stars, but I have tried to change the language multiple times and it just changes back.

Frustrating The search engine is absolutely useless - returns what Amazon want to push rather than what I want, even using filters - which are also pretty useless. I can not set my own defaults, for example leave Prime permanently on. What happened to putting the customer first?

They constantly lose packages and at the best they arrive late. If you want to order to Baltics dont bother! Best they can do is refund money. They've made the UI so ridiculous to navigate it's almost completely undesirable to even bother trying to use it. besides other changes, they have also removed OPEN ORDERS. i have been with Amazon since 2002 and pre-book many Kindle books for future release. now i can no longer see what and when will be delivered. contacted customer service and was told they are sending feedback from customers on this change. to me that means, thanks but nothing will change. not how to keep long time customers!

I've had to place all of my orders through the website, and now I can't even change the option on the website. Unimpressed.

The new layout is unintuitive and terrible. Why put the menu bar at the bottom of the screen now right on top of my phone's navigation buttons? Put the menu bar back and focus on things that matter like the speed of the app, which can be slow as molasses.

Always check your total before you place your order. I was realized this tricky online shop when I computed the total of my bill before I check out mysteriously they said $35 above are free delivery and some Item are free for my main item but it comes the total was different from my computation. I don't know whats going on to this app coz I ordered here several times I had a screen recorder to prove this issue.

YAY! Amazon fixed the gift card reload issue. There are too many issues to list here but the worst one is that I can no longer reload my Amazon gift card to get 2% added to my balance. I reported this to Amazon two days ago. I was told the issue will be "escalated with the concerned team. They will check on this and will contact you via email within 3-4 business days". In the meantime, I have ordered the items I needed from Walmart. Maybe I should drop Amazon Prime and sign up with Walmart +.

I'm giving Amazon three It could be five with some simple tweaks. For starters sometimes I purchase things for work through this app. It would be nice if I could label my cards on file so that I knew which one was my work card just by looking at it. Also if I had an option to send an invoice directly from the app to my accounting department at work that would make things much easier. Amazon does send a order confirmation email but it's not exactly an invoice.

Great selection of goods to choose from. However the checkout process feels like it could use some improvements. Was a little misleading with the choice of signing up for Prime and confusing when trying to select the delivery date.

The new update has made it impossible to check out. It won't even let me access my cart because it tells me to sign in. When I try to sign in it tells me to enable cookies in my browser. This is an app. It should have nothing to do with cookies in my browser, but fyi, cookies are already enabled in my browser. The update should have been thoroughly tested before launch.

Amazon is a smooth shopping experience for me, and has had excellent customer service any of the times that I have had any kind of an issue, whether it was an item ordered, food order, or electronic order(shows or channel subscriptions on prime video), they have always given my concern prompt attention, and resolved the issue to my liking before making sure there was not anything else I needed! I also appreciate the fact that because I get SNAP, they give me a discount on prime membership!

Mobile is not made for mobile anymore. What has happened? To get to the bottom and click "next" it's now waaaaaaay over to the right. It's hard to find it at the bottom. It's like I'm looking at a desktop version. Please fix! Otherwise, I love Amazon shopping.

Maybe it's bad timing but I've had to reach out twice today to customer service chat and keep getting disconnected or the agent leaves the chat. Since the last update, the app has become USELESS. Any time I try to look at an item, the app freezes. It doesn't matter how long I wait, it will not unfreeze. It doesn't matter whether it is the only app I have open, it still does this. Fix whatever you screwed up!

App isn't working properly it constantly goes blank where all I can see is the picture of a product I have to scroll down until the words and sizes/options appear. It's highly inconvenient. Never had this problem prior to the updated app.

The only issue I have is when you search for something specific it brings up things your not looking for. I absolutely love Amazon, mainly for the fair prices, reliability and their usual fast shipping/delivery time. App crashes frequently, especially if it forces the app to load from an amazon product link. Forces you to use a "desktop" computer for some features. Not as happy as I was with the Amazon of 10 years ago, but it's still the best online shopping experience out there EDIT: new upgrade, the inner that moved the home and cart business to the bottom of the screen seems to have made the app sluggish where it used to easily load, and unable to even get to my cart at times.

The worst online shopping app ever, totally non professional with the worst customer service and expensive prices, It has been more than 2 months and I didn't retrieve my souq account yet with all my items, and unfortunately I made an order recently and was paid with visa that wad cancelled by the courier without contacting me at all !!! and I didn't get my money back yet, and the item I needed to buy is now sold out. Amazon is an exceptional experience. I love it, especially the access to buying lower priced items (maybe the box had a dent). So what? The item is still perfect.

Has not been working with Whole Foods for many days now. I can't search for anything in Whole foods since it only gives me Prime search results, can't place orders at Whole Foods. The app keeps asking to change my address. Then when it does, it removes items from my cart. I just can't deal with this anymore. I'm done. I'm going to Publix.

These last two weeks have been horrible! I have not been able to place orders, the orders do not process through like they should! I have called Amazon, done the chat w/Amazon, cleared cache, forced stop, uninstalled/re-installed, and changed my password AND it's still not working properly!! It's ridiculous!! Whatever was changed was not an improvement!!

Latest update destroyed many features. It's no longer possible to change the shop country or app language in the app itself. So you have to use the browser if you like to shop on another country version or messed up your language settings somehow. They also broke search functionaloty so I can't find relevant products anymore and get a mix of all different product categories instead. How can you mess this up so badly? Uninstalled and using the browser now instead.

userName: Tinna Wilson of N2 The Afterlife
content: I love Amazon! It's very user friendly, and very easy to work. The deliveries could be faster on some things. Over all I have has nothing but great service in the last 5 years! I highly recommend people use Amazon.

Useless search engine; terrible search and filter options compared to desktop (can't even set custom price ranges.) Also every time clicking an amazon link from broswer it freezes. Also, for the person mentioning to 'always read reviews,' many products promoted on amazon have paid fake reviews. There are thousands of products using fake review scams to get to the top of results. Reviews arent as useful as you might think.

I type a specific item in a specific price range in search & it does not understand English. I clicked on an item to view & it brought up the home page. I requested my shipping cost to be reimbursed from the seller for certain returns & Amazon reps said they would, but the seller did not reimburse it.

Ever since this last update, I can't use the app to shop. It will search for what I'm looking for and when I click on an item every thing freezes. It literally won't let me do anything but back out of the app. Very frustrating.

90% of items are far far cheaper in real stores. Amazon is charging crazy prices for nearly everything. It's making a mockery of real stores. Also lately prime has been taking 3+ days and deliveries are often sent back because staff aren't bothered to actually look for our door. The ones that do often leave packages at the door without even ringing the bell to notify you. I'm all for contactless delivery during a pandemic, but you gotta let me know my packages are out in the rain

Hate the look of this app. I CAN NEVER FIND IT AMONG OTHER APPS. Tan??? I always skipped over this app looking for it because it doesn't stand out. Shocking for such a dynamic company. Looks dated compared to previous one I never had this problem. I dont like the menu and cart at the bottom either.

Never opens first time. I've use the app across multiple android devices and it's always the same. You open to a blank screen and have to force close and reopen to get it to work. From such a major internet store it's a massive fail

Like most people, I love Amazon. Being an Amazon Prime member is worth it. Faster shipping, cheaper prices in some instances. You can definitely find just about anything on the website. Be sure you check the size charts on clothing, not everything comes from your country. Checkout is quick and wonderful.

The app just like the website is messy and too much information. Purchasing from amazon is a pain for me. It makes me confused with too many things. Not user friendly, I'm surprised how this has become the most wanted online purchase platform in the world !!!

I always enjoy shopping at Amazon, except for one time that I bought an electronic blanket for my sister as a gift, Amazon made a mistake and shipped a construction tool to her! A surprise turned to a trouble, my sister needed to drop off the wrong item to me for return, and I had to reorder the blanket and ship to myself first, because I didn't want to cause anymore trouble to the gift receiver....

The new version of the app is garbage. It causes my phone to crash to restart. My phone gets extremely hot when the app is running. Pages load extremely slow we vent when I'm on wifi. Whover though this new app design was good should be fired.

It's very easy to browse amazon and buy anything you can imagine. Shipping has gotten ridiculously long and it's not after the item shipped, it's getting it out the door that takes so long. Two day prime shipping is now 4 or 5 days.

Latest updates seem to have broken the app. Most times it freezes completely or something's will work but it won't let me click a different size/color and then the app suddenly tries to catch-up. Please fix this.

Trying to search for something and as soon as I click on it, I get sent back to the home page. Tried to uninstall and reinstall but didn't work. Updated app and still a problem. I can't buy something if I can't get to the item!!

For the last 2 weeks I have not been able to browse through the app because it said please try again and couldn't look anything up. And I haven't received notifications when packages are sent out and it arrived. Why is this? It's not my service because everything else works. App is up to date as well.

The ap takes me straight to Amazon shopping. This is what it is supposed to do. But it alerts me to packages and so forth for which I must look elsewhere on my phone. I can't get there within the ap. This is repeatedly annoying. It is handy for quick purchases.

I order a item and it was a fat burning product powder form. And when I receive it on time with prime member. The next day I open it and was sealed. Took the seal off and noticed the container was almost empty and put a bit in water and didn't look right and smell horrible. So tried getting support help with chatting and that is totally a mess . Kept sending the same message and was really frustrated. So I thought I would try to get a refund . Must return a almost empty container. Truly stupid.

Main Screen. None of the pics work when you click on them. Like none of them. What did you do?! Terrible update and interface. I can't click on a single product in my main Screen anymore. Kinda hard to find the item now

Great app to use, always purchasing, but do have the occasional bug where if I purchase multiple products together, it won't let me see individual items to see their price, it'll only tell me the bundle I bought together, but other than that, very few other bugs!

This is for the Corp itself: y'all need to add some kind of notification that tells a shopper when their order didn't go through/needs revision rather than not stating anything when a purchase doesn't go through, where I gotta open the app to see that a payment revision is needed. This wouldn't be as much a big deal if the order I thought I'd made wasn't for something to keep my pain levels down, and thought was going to arrive tomorrow and not Monday now. :/

I can't surf the web without stuff I browsed on here coming up as pop-up ads. Quit tracking me! My information is not for sale. If I want to buy something I do. I don't need to be reminded of something I didn't buy, it wasn't purchased for a reason dummy! The only worthwhile part of amazon is their reviews, if you are willing to wade thru their paid reviews that nullify honest ones

For the past 6 months, for every item I open I get this, "we're sorry an error has occurred. please reload this page and try again." I tried every solution possible, restart, uninstall, stop, reboot device, clean cache.

The new app is trash. Bugs everywhere. The search bar doubles, my orders are empty sometimes, I can't press the home button, delivery times/day are wrong until I place the order. Please fix it. Then I will update my review.

Recently found that Amazon dealing with fake business who sell defective product and closing business after stock gone. At the end what respond I got from Amazon team "Since this seller is no longer with Amazon, we do not have any details as of now. If you can try checking on internet maybe that helps". So basically what Amazon have on business it dealing with is only "Name". Be careful from who you buying.

Newest version is not good...just like the others are saying. I agree with derekate and lacy reviews. Please read theirs! Every time I search for something it stays in the search bar, even though Im done and go to the home landing page. üôÉ

searching on this app is terrible, many times the top results are product that are ether counterfeit or false advertising. it takes a long time to check to make sure that the product and seller is legit. one mayor problem is that items labelled as prime are also priced higher by about $10 than normal on other sites which gives the impression that 2day shipping is not actually covered by prime membership you really just end up paying more for faster shipping

The update is AWFUL! I can't even shop, it won't show past orders in order to reorder and it won't show items I am trying to search for. ABSOLUTLEY TERRIBLE update!!!! I went to to store instead of ordering from this app. Frustrating! Who would approve this app change!?! BRING BACK THE OLD FORMAT so we can actually use the app to shop, isn't that the point of the app?

amazon is the best place to find so much in one place. but be careful what you order. there are so many knock off items on there. I bought so many things expecting good quality, only to be sent shoddy second rate items made overseas cheaply. always check the supplier!!!! can't stress that enough!!!!

It seemed to work okay until about a week ago. Now it won't bring up any searches, my account, my orders, nothing. Even the factory installed Amazon application on my phone stopped working as well so I'm not sure what's going on unless they're purposely sabotaging their service.

I don't like dealing with liars. You lie on your app about your return policy. You say I don't need to package my return. When I get to the UPS store I'm told I need to package my return. I talked to the owner. She said you refuse to change your instructions in the app and the UPS personnel can deal with the customers. Apparently, UPS doesn't like dealing with liars, either. They are in the process of canceling their contact with you. Another note. Your search engine needs a lot of work.

It's so hard to scroll. The minute you put your finger on the screen it's registers a "tap" instead of a hold. Makes it next to impossible to scroll. Basic app stuff that a massive company fails miserably at.

I've been using this app a couple of years now. I especially like that I can wake up with a shopping list on my mind at 3am and can put said items in my shopping cart without having to go to my laptop hours later. It is quite handy and simple to use.

Amazon doesn't understand the concept of delivery. If I wanted to go somewhere to pick up stuff I purchased I would go to a store. Lately, many items are sent to the post office or a parcel locker. I order for delivery, not pick up. Why would I pay $13 monthly for delivery just to go & pick up things. This beyond ridiculous. Now I have to request another refund.

I constantly have to uninstall and reinstall everytime I want to use the app. Was told months ago it was an issue they were aware of and they were working on it. Still the same problems so may have to consider looking elsewhere to companies with apps that work and suit my needs.

The best on line shopping. I always find what I want or need and sometimes even better, I didn't realize I needed it till I saw it here! Always great prices but the thing I find the most satisfying is the absolutely humongous product selection with reviews I can relate to and trust.

With the update the app has been crashing and one time my screen froze and wouldnt let me turn off my phone to reset. Please fix this soon! Everytime I view a product and scroll down, things keep disappearing off the screen too.

The app distorts; putting home icons at the bottom and the font distorts as well. I trusted the prior app, this upgrade makes me feel like there is a mole inside of it! I log off all the time now! I never had to before! Sad!

After factory wiping my phone due to a virus, the app is requiring me to verify my account via a link sent by text. This would be fine, but the link does not function; I receive the error message "the web address you entered is not a functioning page on our site." Thinking of doing all my shopping on ebay from this point.

I love shopping on Amazon but the new version of the app is useless. Constantly crashes then needs to be installed, then OK for a day or two before crashing again. Such a shame as everything else about Amazon is great.

95% of the time I use this app to check orders and tracking. What used to be a simple one-click function is now a futile exercise in hunt, peck, hunt, peck. It seems Amazon has doomed this function to be completely removed from the app by 2022. They move it every month or so... And now I can't even find it anymore. I'm so done with this app. B'Bye... Uninstalled

generally in happy. But, I ordered items on deep sale and they refunded the money. Amazon claimed it was undeliverable or broken, but it could be ordered again at full price. Rip off!So why not send a replacement or let me choose refund or replacement? This is a bogus prime day come on. Is it the manufacturer or Amazon? Either way, Amazon is responsible

Everything was great till I tried to get a refund. Its been a 2 week nightmare after numerous calls and still no refund. I'm about done with Amazon because of this. And it's all giftcard refund. They've had the watch back for 2 weeks now and they refuse to give me my refund! I will probably be seeking legal recourse in regards to thier false statements about getting our refunds.

It's a great app, I mean it's Amazon so what should I expect lol. you can buy a huge variety of items, food, etc. the app is also convenient because I dont want to always pull out my laptop or wait for Google to load just to go to Amazon. the checkout is easy, just set up your payment type and you're ready to go. i also love the option to "send items as gifts". it helped with the Secret Santa I did this Christmas. so, thanks jeff bezos I guess.üíÄ

Have used amazon for a little while now. I cancelled one item and have never received a refund and then placed an order the other day where my money was taken and my order cancelled but no explanation given. Still waiting on the refund for that a week later. Let's see if I get this refund. Massive company with no customer service skills.

I ordered a skirt and then was automaticly signed up to Amazon Prime. I thought I had cancelled this, but have just had ¬£7.99 taken out of my account today. Why do you do this, get peoples account details and then taken advantage of older people's lack of knowledge of how things work today. We buy things if we want them, if we don't ask we don't want!!

Been a customer for a long time. Most products available are as promised. Some products may not be so. Me personally had no problems initially. But after being a customer for some time now, i have been logged out of my account based on suspicious activity (me trying to buy stuff) and its been a pain to verify and authenticate myself. Don't know what's happening with Amazon but you were great once upon a time. Atleast in terms of Convenience and Customer Service.

Normally, this is my go-to app for practically everything that I buy. After this last update though, this app along with a couple others, keeps crashing or just refusing to open at all. Its super annoying and I hope they fix this QUICK:/

Good app and I only ever come across one bug. When I do a Google search for an item and there is a link to search that item on Amazon, it freezes up when trying to open this Amazon app. Not a big problem but just a minor inconvenience.

Honestly the shopping experience is fine but I left a one star because everytime I use a gift card on Amazon it cancels my order and temporary locks my accounts. They said to put in the information, which I did and send a document. I didnt know what they meant so I just sent them a picture of the gift card. Now I'm permanently locked out of my account. This happened on 3 separate times, 2 with Amazon gift card and 1 visa gift card. Please let me just buy off of your site!

I've ordered items tried getting on to see where my order was and now it wont even pull the app up it comes up as a white screen for a couple seconds, and then completely vanishes, very irritating I can not get on the app what so ever, paying for something I can't use and cant even get into the app to cancel it b.s

Can always find what I'm looking for at good price and free prime shipping. Using SmileAmazon, Amazon donates a small percentage of each order to the charity of my choice (a local Dachshund rescue org). Easy app to navigate. Easy checkout. I can use my cc reward points on my Amazon purchases.

Can you PLEASE add a share icon/button. There are goods on Amazon that I like to share with friends and family. But the only way I can share it is to go to the Amazon website. I have to uninstall the app, login through chrome in order to do this. If there is a way to share on the app, make it easier because it's confusing.

I have had a great experience with them . They have followed my delivery instructions. I've only had to return one order & great options they have on how wish you refund to be. Give it a shot, that's all you can do . :) HAPPY SHOPPING.

Is it me or is the app crashing as soon as it is opened? I noticed it happening today as I've opened it after a few days now. My samsung galaxy s20 ultra had a software update today. I opened the app, it showed a white screen for 2 seconds and back to the list of apps. I uninstalled the app and reinstalled it, it worked for a while. I just tried openning the app again and it started doing the whole white screen then crash... what sorcery is this? Anyone else has this issue?

Horrible since recent update. Slow, doesn't load what I'm searching for half the time, freezes up. Can't view user revuew pictures properly as unable to zoom in. New layout is also rubbish. Counter intuative, unnecessary change. Just poor Amazon

I'm sick of amazon, I uses to buy plenty of items on the apps and when I try to look for something it Diverted me to different page when I get to the page the price is ridiculous high for some stuff average but it is not. Differently no more using the overpriced and waste of a app. The app is absolutely rubbish!

Amazon just can't seem to get it right. I ordered a brand new air compressor that didn't work after i paid to install. the second one lasted 1 week. I bought a show that airs every Sunday but I have to wait till Monday to watch it. I just ordered 2 heating elements and they sent the wrong items, now I have to wait till Saturday to get a hot shower. The supervisor ended the chat immediately without responding. this will be the last time I cancel prime! horrible customer service.
App not functioning correctly, everytime I try to open an item to view, it takes me back to the home page. Even after uninstalling and reinstalling the app, this problem keeps happening :(

Customer service was not good. The first order was lost and I never received an apology or any type of compensation for my time. I ordered a battery for my computer. I was in a tight spot trying to get final finished for school. I was forced to go to library and only had limited time on computer. It was very frustrating and time consuming.No compensation for gas, time, or lost hours. Just nothing. I am disappointed. This was my first order on Prime trial.

I have been battling with Amazon for the last 1 plus years about a prime account which is not mine. I've spoken to customer service representatives and customer service supervisors. The most recent was a few weeks ago, so let see if this situation has finally been resolved and see if I will not be charged again for Amazon Prime that I did not sign up for!

Fraud detection is good, but too strict. VPN use is normal and should be expected. I tried placing an order, it got cancelled, I got locked out, got back on, placed it again, got cancelled and locked out again. Phone number was unnamed and email about being called came after the call, at which point I picked up. I wasn't able to place the order successfully. I've been a member for several years and also have prime membership. Looking forward to getting my account unlocked and order placed.

Language changes just happen, and I can't help.but wonder if it's "helpful" racism. I keep having to change my default language back to English and then have to uninstall the app are reinstall to get it to take. I don't know why it feels the need to change without asking in both languages if it's actually what I want.

App is pretty good. Only one complaint: after doing a search - if you choose a filter option the app disregards any specific search term used and just returns every general item in the category. This is infuriating.

Absolutely disgusting, a-hole design. Pay 7.99 for Prime, make purchases often and STILL this app slips ads and goodness knows what through. My ad blocking system goes mental running this app and constantly getting an "Oops, something went wrong" because it's blocking ad servers left right and center - WHY ARE YOU FORCING ADS ON SUBSCRIPTION USERS?!?!!!!!!
Almost perfect, other than after a few months the app refreshes or crashes when you load it or when searching for items. Each time I have to reinstall to get it to work normally.

The upcoming deals are no longer available in the app. I have contacted Amazon twice and have pretty much been blown off. I have expressed that the issue is in the app. I have even uninstalled and reinstalled the app.

App needs an overhaul. Lists, and your orders should always be listed on the very front. Amazon app and the Amazon website in general is extremely busy! Needs to simplify columns and areas that you need to navigate around.

Had no problems until recently when app kept switching language to Spanish, even after I saved it to English more than 8 times. I reuninstalling the app it as a possible solution as per Amazon support. Will check now to see I can set language permanently to English!

One of the best things about Amazon was their customer service department. You can no longer call customer service. Delivery drivers can dump packages outside anywhere to be stolen and you can't reach anyone. They now use an ineffective chat feature. They tried to say it's because of Corona virus, but that's a lie because just as much as they can chat, they should be able to call. Chatting is not helpful. I'm a prime member. I may not be renewing or using because if this inconvenience.

The new look sucks. It's super frustrating when you go through pages and pages looking for something specific, and then all of a sudden it goes to the home screen and the search is gone, with no way of getting back to where I was, except by starting over. And still no dark theme.

Not a smooth experience.. Great shopping site but for a long while on the app now there is a very annoying glitch. When you thumb up to scroll items it mostly doesn't scroll and sometimes goes downwards. Like walking in deep mud almost every 3rd or 4th scroll. Not my phone settings btw.... Any one else have this problem ?

I've made an order since january this year but the item until now still not arrive...the best part is, they're giving fake tracking id.... try to contact seller for the tracking id several time but the instant messaging system is not helping at all...now try to make refund still no answer from both amazon or the seller . In summary, SHITTIEST APP EVER USED

Personally, I hate the Amazon locker system. Never agreed to it and I hate the fact that when something gets delivered and put inside I have to wait for, MAYBE, an email to pop in that'll have my code to open the locker instead of just being able to find it under the delivered item(s) details.

Not only did they destroy the UX with the last update, but they broke the app. It's SO SLOW it's making me not shop. So frustrating. The new layout is awful and not at all intuitive. It's not that it's new, it's truly bad.

App is the worst!!! I've used it for years now on several phones but recently it constantly freezes. Takes ages to load and I've stopped using it. It is now at the point that if it takes too long to load I go else where to purchase my items.
Photos are really pixelated and do not clear up since last update. This is kind of frustrating, but I can always open up my browser to view the clearer photos. Otherwise, the app has improved.

I love ordering thru Amazon. But lately I'm very disappointed with it. Because 3 of my packages have been lost and yah I get a refund. But its still frustrating cuz now my kids or myself don't have what we ordered and have to go else where to get it. Cuz I don't trust trying to order it again thru Amazon with the chance of the delivery place who ever it may be losing it.

I do any and all friend and family shopping through Amazon, all of my personal shopping as well. Mainly due to the fact that if anything, and I literally mean ANYTHING, messes up with your order Amazon will immediately step in and figure it out. Resolving matters quickly with both parties pleased. I have zero worry about the products I buy. Many thanks Amazon!! Kelley

I LOVE AMAZON!!! Only issue I have with it, is that some of the prices change SO DRASTICALLY... for example, I am looking into buying new mattresses for my kids, the ones I decided on were priced at $160... 3 days later when I got paid and went back to buy them, the price had jumped to $389... WAY TOO MUCH...

I've never had issues when using this app or even shopping with Amazon in general. the few occasions where I've had something I wasn't happy with etc, their customer service went above and beyond to make it right.

I use to get my things when I was told I would. Now I am getting notifications that my things are delivered and they're not. Also lately I select something that I want then within a few hours to a few days if still in my to order list, I will get notice that the price has changed and for the most part it's higher.

Easy to buy stuff. Super slow app. Not sure why it is so slow. Every other app I have will load before this one can even pull up the menu. Whatever amazon is doing with this app they are doing it wrong. It's the 21st century. Your app shouldn't take 5 min to load one page.

Amazon Shopping has literally made our lives easier... Especially during these pandemic times, it is delivering to my small village without any difficulty, where I don't even have grocery or food delivery. Kudos to the üöö agents! This app is also easy to use.Truly recommended!

For some reason the app signed me out and won't let me back in it says my password is wrong which it's not them when I hit thebaxk button it says to check my internet connection and this app is the only thing that I'm having a problem with on my phone even the website won't work. I've had Amazon prome for over 10 years now and now I don't know if I want it anymore

I've used this app for many years now. In fact I use it every day! Almost everything I buy now a days I buy off Amazon but since the most recent update I can no longer use the app!! Every time I open it the app closes. Im very dissapointed. Please fix this so I can continue to use the app! Id rather not cancel my prime & subscriptions.

I really do enjoy using this app. Its easy to use and search for many items. However I do not like that it says my package was delivered to my door but sometimes that's a lie and i should wait 2 more days to see if it shows up. Please stop updating the status as delivered if this is not the case

This app would be great if it would give you the ability to call other departments besides this third-party outsource center that does absolutely NOTHING for you. Ever. And I'd also love for the app to be able to update my orders actual status, because I hate being reminded of the multiple times I was disappointed seeing items in the "Your Orders" section that I never received still showing as "running late."

Horrible customer service. They have no answers, or information. I was blocked from leaving reviews, and my past reviews from almost 10 years ago deleted, and I couldnt even get an answer as to why? I was early Christmas shopping end of last year. So I figured let me make sure everything works before putting aside, and leave some reviews since I noticed there's a score for a profile and figured why not bring it up. I WAS ABOUT TO GO PRIME, AND THIS CHANGED MY MIND! Now amazon is last resort.

It's been good 95% of the time. But whenever there's been any problems as a buyer it got resolved quickly. My problem is getting good help with my reopening my seller account. There seems to no one to actually speak with to resolve the issue. The normal customer service ppl can't help.

BANNED AFTER LEAVING TOO MANY POSITIVE REVIEWS AFTER CHRISTMAS SHOPPING!!! They said my reviews were fraudulent because they were almost all 5 stars. I talked to amazon support 4 times and they keep refusing to verify the "evidence", then said they will no longer respond to my requests. I was nothing but polite and professional with sellers & customer support for the 4-5 years that I used Amazon. I did most of my shopping on Amazon, but I'm not making a new account. I no longer support them.

Ok, so i've TRIED to be patient and what not, But there has been a malfunction with amazon and it doesn't let me buy things. I've already tried to contact someone because my account got locked when i was using a gift card, i had 80 dollars on that card and i'm just never getting them back. I then waited for a response but nothing happened after the account getting locked email. I also had a different account, that account i used a normal card and the SAME thing happended again, this time $43.

The new update doesn't allow you to easily look into photos of products. Gets stuck... Would be nice if Amazon allowed you to upload video reviews here instead of having to go on the computer every time (very inconvenient).

My favorite place to shop... I love it sooo much I have 2 accounts... 12 fire sticks... 3 amazon echo's... 3 fire TV's... & 2 amazon tablets... Love amazon... Customer service has always been great if ever an issue arises... Just try them & you will fall in love too... No this is not a paid advertisement... Though with all the stuff I own & buy from here I should get some free stuff or atleast consider me testing & reviewing products for them... Just saying... Put in a good word for me... Lol

it's the best shopping app. there is way better than ebay i tried them once and the sent me an email saying my package had been shipped and then two days later told me that my order had been canceled due to being out of stock. needless to say I deleted that app. and been using Amazon and haven't had a problem yet and my packages are usually a couple days early üôÉ üôÇ
They keep changing the interface, always new ways to find your orders. But it's in a good direction. Just be careful with the biased rating's. Free returns are always nice.

Theres all kinds of great stuff to buy on amazon but most of all packages either dont show up or they're very late. My bf and I became an amazon prime members and still theres no change... this is beyond frustrating and whenever I try to get help from someone they make me email a seller and wait even longer. I'm over it.

Amazon disabled my account from posting item reviews from items I've purchased. Not sure why. I've never violated any terms or conditions or falsified a review. Just a heads up before anybody gets upset, it happened to me for absolutely no reason. Expect the same to happen to you. Don't waste time emailing support. Vendors are probably wondering why they aren't getting reviews. Which means they should be able to sue Amazon. That's what I would do.

Amazon eReader just deleted over 1000 ebooks from my kindle. They say because I had originally bought with another Gmail address(when I was new to all this stuff) I had broke my phone and set up new Gmail not know that the books on my original account (1000+) would be lost. Even after making tons of calls, giving correct info, because I didn't know the debit card I used when I bought them, they took my books. Amazon are crooks. Don't spend your money on anything you can't hold. They take it away

Im usually somewhat pleased with customer service. Not this time. I have ordered FOUR ice machines over the last few years. All quit within a small timeframe. This time was an igloo. I didn't remember to get an extended warranty because most last a few months at least. Today, the machine keeps reading add water. Contacted support to do all the same things I already tried to no avail. I was then told its it of amazon warranty and to contact manufacturer. Igloo only offers 30 day warranty!

It's a great app, fun and easy to shop with. The only complaint that I have is lately when clicking on an item to view it, the items page will blip oyn and out of existence. I don't know how to fix it as it doesn't need an update. Is anyone else experiencing these issues?
For such a tech giant like Amazon, this app is an embarrassment. Slow, clunky, buggy, ugly, unintuitive navigation... It's more convenient to go to a physical retail store like in the 90's.

How to Fix Recent Crash Issue (3/23/21): ANDROID has the issue not Amazon (or Gmail which has the same issue). You have to update 2 apps - Android System Webview and Google Chrome. If you need instructions, there are 2 methods: 1) In the Play Store, click the upper left corner icon and press "my apps." There will be a list of apps that need updating, and you should be able to find those 2. 2) Search for the apps, and click "update" where it would normally say "open."
